tuv.seg: "DIR ▸rαz" is the standard translation mode for|arrivals. When engaged it captures the current|velocity instead of enforcing the commanded|approach velocity.
『DIR ▸rαz』是标准的进港平移模式。接通时，该模式捕获当前速度，而不强制使用指令的进近速度。
"Plan The Fly"|The ship's avionics is designed to execute flight |plans prepared using the integrated planner.|General help and workflows are available in the|Flight Planning category.
『规划飞行』|飞船的航电旨在执行由规划器生成的飞行计划。『飞行规划』类别的检查单提供了各类帮助和工作流。

"Precision" vs "Non-Precision" departures:|▸ Precision|Depart the station following a pre-established|flight plan and at a precise time.|▸ Non-Precision|Depart the station without timing constraint onto|a parking orbit.
『精密』与『非精密』离港：|▸ 精密|按预先制定的飞行计划在精确时间离开空间站。|▸ 非精密|在没有时间约束的情况下离开空间站，进入一个停泊轨道。
- 或（降轨离港）- 光标转到【Pe】
...|2 - synchronize the map time with the real time,|3 - place the cursor ahead of the ship marker |(in the future). The cursor legend indicates the|time difference.
……|2 - 将地图时间与实时同步，|3 - 将光标置于飞船标记之后（置于未来）。光标上方将显示距现在时间。

/!\ operation non reversible in flight.|If equipped and drawing too much power from|the bus, consider manually disconnecting the |device. /!\ This operation is pyrotechnical and|cannot be reversed in flight.
⚠ 此操作在飞行中不可逆。|若设备从汇流条消耗了过多电力，考虑手动断开设备。⚠ 断开操作由火工装置执行，飞行中不可逆。
A "Departure" routine is available in the Nav |Toolbox. NB: it is normally automatically invoked|as part of the Precision Departure flow.
可在『导航工具箱』中调用『Departure』（离港）例程。注意：它通常作为精密离港流程的一部分被自动调用。
A R U ventilation mode: ON
A R U 通风模式：开启
A critical device's diagnostic system signaled a fault |after detecting a deviation from the nominal|operation.
某关键设备的诊断系统检测到设备偏离了标称运行状态，发出了失效信号。

A device's circuit breaker tripped, disconnecting|it from its supply electrical bus. Probable causes:|- the temperature got too high or too low,|- the power drain largely exceeded the rated the|device's specification, either from misusage or|damage.
某设备的跳开关跳出，使设备从为其供电的汇流条断开。可能原因：|- 温度过高或过低。|- 误操作或受损导致设备功耗严重超标。
A device's diagnostic system signaled a fault |after detecting a deviation from the nominal|operation.
某设备的诊断系统检测到设备偏离了标称运行状态，发出了失效信号。
A flight plan must have been loaded into the |flight controller
飞行计划必须已经载入飞行控制器。

A minimum of 3 satellites must be in range for|the SPS system to operate, 4 for optimum |accuracy. Moreover the solid angle from which|the constellation is seen determines the|maximum achievable accuracy. The larger the|angle the better, the corresponding multiplier|on the optimum precision is measured as the |"Dilution of Precision" (DoP) factor.
SPS 系统需要接收至少 3 颗卫星才能工作，4 颗才能达到理想精度。此外，从接收位置观察时卫星之间的立体角也决定了可用精度上限，角度越大精度越高。立体角带来的精度损失系数称为『精度衰减』（DoP）因子。
A precision departure is part of a flight plan |prepared ahead of time. The ship follows OTC's|instructions to the departure stack, then wait for|the start of the flight plan. See the detailed flow.
精密离港是提前制定的飞行计划的一部分。飞船按照 OTC 的引导到达离港栈，然后等待飞行计划开始。详细流程见此。
A reference trajectory is built using the various |flight planning tools available in the Navigation|Station.
使用导航站中的各种飞行规划工具建立参考轨迹。
A short-range high-precision radio navaid |broadcasted by all spaceports on the SRPS |channel set.
近程高精度无线电导航，所有太空港均配备，在 SRPS 频道集广播。
ALL hatches and equalisation valves: Closed
关闭所有舱口和均压活门
APP Transition Flow (relative flight near stations)
APP 中转流程（在空间站附近相对其飞行）。
APP velocity = velocity for translations around|spaceports. Maximum is typically 3 m/s
APP 速度 = 太空港附近平移时的速度。最大值通常为 3 m/s。
Activate "synchronize cursor with time" then |sweep or set map time = real time.
激活『同步光标与时间』，然后扫掠时间，或设定地图时间 = 实时。
Activate the RX (reception) mode for the slot
激活此槽位的 RX（接收）模式。

Activate the Space Positioning System receiver|to use the available radio navigation aids. |NB: the SPS receiver also processes close range|high-precision PPS signals (Proximity Positioning|System). See example for slot A of unit 1 below.
激活空间定位系统接收机，以便使用可用的无线电导航辅助。注意：SPS 接收机也负责处理近程高精度 PPS（邻近定位系统）信号。参见下文 1 组件 A 槽的示例。

Activate the Water Processing and Storage Unit A.|The WPSUs manage the crew module's water|circuits. Only one of them can be active at a given|time.|With the water fill valve open the unit will pump |the station's water into its pressurized tank.
激活水处理与储存装置（WPSU）A。|WPSU 管理乘员舱的水回路。同一时刻只能运行一台 WPSU。水加注活门开启时，装置会从空间站取水，泵入自身加压水箱。
Activate the Water Processing and Storage Unit A.|With the water fill valve open the unit will empty|the tank into the station's recycling system.
激活水处理与储存装置 A。水加注活门开启时，装置会排空自身水箱，将水排入空间站的回收系统。

Activate the pressurant pumps (increase the |target pressure if required). This will provide |about 4 MW of cooling for a few minutes.|The hydrogen is stored into the pressurant tanks|for further use.
激活增压气体泵（按需增大目标压力）。此操作可提供约 4 MW，持续数分钟的制冷。热氢会被存入增压气体箱待用。

Activate the ship's transponder (click the selector).|‣ AIS = Alliance Identification System, encrypted |and valid only within Alliance space |‣ GNR = Galactic Navigation Regulations, in clear|and valid everywhere
激活飞船的应答机（单击旋钮）。|‣ AIS = 联盟识别系统，加密，仅在联盟领空内有效。|‣ GNR = 银河导航条例，明文，在任何空域均有效。
Activate the thrust controller (push the selector).
激活推力控制器（单击旋钮）。
Activates the ARU revitalization mode:|- ventilation|- CO2 removal|- atmosphere temperature control|- relative humidity control
激活 ARU 再生模式：|- 通风。|- 除二氧化碳。|- 大气温度控制。|- 相对湿度控制。
激活 1 区机动反作用组件。
激活 2 区机动反作用组件。
激活 3 区机动反作用组件。
Activates the ship's "Identification Friend or Foe"|system
激活飞船的敌我识别系统。
Active W P S U as required
按需激活 W P S U
Adjust the T° cooling and heating thresholds as|required. Nominal window is:|- cooling when T° > 300 K|- heating when T° < 240K
按需调节制冷与制热的 T° 阈值。标称温度窗口为：|- T° > 300 K 时制冷。|- T° < 240K 时制热。
Adjust the amount of thrust allocated for attitude|control ("ROT" for rotational). Higher settings |shorten rotation times at the cost of more energy|and hydrogen.
调节为姿控分配的推力（『ROT』表示旋转）。|较高的设置会以更高的电耗和氢耗为代价缩短旋转时间。
Adjust the amount of thrust allocated for |translations ("LIN" for linear). Higher settings |shorten rotation times at the cost of more energy|and hydrogen.
调节为平移分配的推力（『LIN』表示线性）。|较高的设置会以更高的电耗与氢耗为代价缩短加减速时间。
Adjust the approach target velocity. Higher |settings will shorten translation times at the cost|of more energy from the SMESs.
调节目标进近速度。较高的设定会以消耗更多 SMES 储能的代价缩短平移时间。
Adjust the departure delay (w.r.t the current time).|- ◭ to reset to 1 hour|- ⨺ to adjust the delay|- ⨺ on external ring to adjust the increment
调整离港延迟（相对于当前时间的）|- ◭ 重置为 1 小时。|- ⨺ 调整延迟。|- ⨺ 操作外圈，调整调节步长。
Adjust the device usage so as to minimize the|inflicted wear. Monitor the reported estimated|wear rate multiplier.
调整设备负载，以尽量减少耗损。注意监控预计耗损率乘数。
Adjust the polarization rate selector as required|so that the process is complete a few minutes|prior to the jump. Increasing the rate puts more|strain on the drive and require more power.
按需调节极化速率，使极化提前于跳跃数分钟完成。增加极化速率会加重驱动器负荷，消耗更多电力。
Adjust the power allocation for the active MRUs.|Typical with the reactor offline is "Linear" to save|power, at the cost of a lower ISP (specific impulse)|= a larger hydrogen consumption.
调节 MRU 的功率分配。反应堆离线时通常使用『Linear』以节省电力，代价是较低的 ISP（比冲）= 高氢耗。
Adjust the power allocation for the active MRUs.|Typical with the reactor online is "Medium" to |save hydrogen (higher ISP) as power is provided|by the main generators (DECs).
调节活动 MRU 的功率分配。反应堆运行时有主发电机（DEC）提供电力，因此通常设为『Medium』以节省氢气（提高比冲）。

Adjust the projected path to the flaring zone using|translation thrust (default: numpad keys).|Nominal display: ──○─ ─ ─ ─|blue: incoming approach path|green: flaring zone|dashed gray: missed flare path|⤯εp is the lateral error relative to the flaring zone.|A correction is necessary when ⤯εp > 120m
使用平移推力（默认键位：小键盘）调整到消速区的预计路径。|正常应显示：──○─ ─ ─ ─|蓝色：进近路径|绿色：消速区|灰色虚线：消速失败时的路径|⤯εp 为相对消速区的横向误差。|若 ⤯εp > 120m，则必须执行修正。
Adjust the reactor power as required
Adjust the reactor power as required.
Adjust the reactor power if needed. The |generated power (DECs) should be sufficient to|maintain a positive balance.
按需调节反应堆功率。发电量（DEC）须足以保持正的功率平衡。
After undocking the ship will have to fly to the|"departure point" (defined relatively to the |station). The corresponding cylindrical |coordinates are described below.
脱离对接后，飞船必须飞往『离港点』（其位置相对于空间站定义）。下文解释离港点位置的柱面坐标。
Align the ship's horizontal with the orbital plane.|(this is a usual flying convention for departing |ships)
将飞船水平线与轨道平面对齐。（离港飞船的惯例）。
All 3 SMES at more than 20% energy
所有三个 SMES 能量均高于 20%。
所有 ESCU 接入主汇流条

All electrical power sources in the CSN-F9 are|protected against short circuits. However when|several of these generators are connected|in parallel the one with the highest voltage output|supplies most of the current load while the |remaining ones stay idle. This may lead to|unbalanced wear and possibly overloads in some|situations.
CSN-F9 的所有电源都配有短路保护。然而，当数个电源并联时，输出电压最高的电源会负担大部分电流负载，同时其余电源几乎空载。这可能导致耗损不平衡，并在某些情况下诱发过载。
All fill valves should be closed.
All main bus ties to ON
主汇流条连接器：全部闭合
All trajectories start from a given location, with|a given velocity, at a given time. These do not|necessarily correspond to the ship's current state.
所有轨迹都需要起始于给定时间、给定速度、给定位置。这些初始条件不必对应飞船的当前状态。
Allocate more plasma to the DEC as required.
按需为 DEC 分配更多等离子体。
Allows the routines to break the transfer into two|legs. This can lead to more efficient trajectories,|especially when the initial and target orbits are|inclined w.r.t each other.
【启用两步执行】|允许例程将进近划分为两个航节。这样可以创建更高效的轨迹，尤其是初始和目标轨道之间有倾角时
Alternatively you can manually create and edit a|destination orbit using the parking orbit editor|then select it.
或者，你也可以使用停泊轨道编辑器手动创建、编辑目的轨道，然后选择它。
Alternatively, it's possible to run only the path|analysis without the detailed routing. This can|be used for fast preliminary estimations but does|not generate a flyable plan.
或者，也可以只运行寻路分析，而不进行详细规划。这只能用于快速初步评估，不会生成可飞行的计划。
Alternatively, set the flare parameters from the|station's information panel.
或者，参考空间站的信息面板设定消速参数。
An / Dn: ascending and descending nodes|Ap / Pe: apoapsis and periapsis|Legs can are selected in the "Legs and Jumps"|table.
An / Dn：升交点与降交点|Ap / Pe：远拱点与近拱点|可以在『Legs and Jumps』表中选择航节。
An advanced routine to intercept an object and|optionally rendez-vous with it.
用于拦截或交会目标的高级例程。

Approach Nav Data Download - CSN 1.0.0|Download the approach navigation data from the|approach anchor object (typically station)|Expected initial conditions:|- Approach anchor object set|- Comms Setup checklist complete
进近导航数据下载 - CSN 1.0.0|从进近锚点对象（通常为空间站）下载进近导航数据。|预期初始条件：|- 进近锚点对象设置。|- 通信设置检查单完成。
进近导航数据下载流程
进近导航数据下载流程完成

Approach Planning - CSN 0.8.0|Plans an approach to a target station taking into|account the safety restrictions = low-∆V reactor|offline arrival. The routine inserts two main burns:|- transfer injection toward the target|- braking to the final glide segment|The last burn is performed at a safe distance from|the target, leaving the ship on a "glide" trajectory.|The final rendez-vous maneuver can be handled |by the MRUs (maneuvering thrusters) with the|reactor offline.
进近规划 - CSN 0.8.0|规划前往目标空间站的，考虑了安全约束的进近 = 低 ∆V 停堆进港。此例程插入两次主要点火：|- 目标转移注入。|- 最终滑行段进入制动。|最后一次点火会在距目标安全距离外完成，将飞船送入『滑行』轨迹。最终交会机动足以由 MRU（机动推力器）在反应堆离线时执行。
Approach Setup|Setup an approach with Traffic Control then |prepare the related flight plan.
进近建立|联系交通管制申请进近，并准备相应飞行计划。
Arm the drive to authorize the jump.
预位驱动器以准许跳跃。
Arm the translation as the pending APP |sub-mode
预位该平移，使其成为待命的 APP 子模式。
Arms the SMES "quenching" protection which|releases the stored energy in case of imminent|magnetic storage failure (typically if the|temperature of the superconducting coils gets |too high).
预位 SMES『失超』保护。一旦超导磁储能即将失效（通常是在超导线圈温度过高时），该保护系统将释放所储存的能量。
Arms the SMES "quenching" protection which|releases the stored energy in case of imminent|magnetic storage failure (typically if the|temperature of the superconducting coils gets|too high).
预位 SMES『失超』保护。一旦超导磁储能即将失效（通常是在超导线圈温度过高时），该保护系统将释放所储存的能量。
Arms the SMES "quenching" protection which|releases the stored energy in case of imminent|magnetic storage failure (typically if the|temperature of the superconducting coils |gets too high).
预位 SMES『失超』保护。一旦超导磁储能即将失效（通常是在超导线圈温度过高时），该保护系统将释放所储存的能量。
Arms the SMES quenching protection which|releases the stored energy in case of imminent|magnetic storage failure (typically if the|temperature of the superconducting coils |gets too high).
预位 SMES 失超保护。一旦超导磁储能即将失效（通常是在超导线圈温度过高时），该保护系统将释放所储存的能量。
As provided in real time by the ship's navigation|sensors.
由飞船的导航传感器实时提供。
As required: run the pre-flight while the refueling|is ongoing.
加注时按需执行飞行前检查单。
At busy hubs it is important to check that the |approach trajectory does not infringe on a|restricted orbspace along the way.
在繁忙的枢纽附近，检查进近轨迹，确保没有入侵限制轨道空域是非常重要的。
At flaring zone, follow Traffic Control instructions to Docking Ingress Point
抵达消速区，按管制引导前往对接入口点
At least 1 A P You On
至少启动一台 A P U
Attempt to evaluate the device's state and if it|may still be used for operations.
尝试评估设备状态，判断设备是否仍可运行。

Attempts to build a sequence of maneuvers and|jumps that lead to the destination. This is done in|two main steps:|1 - path finding analysis|2 - detailed planning based on the candidate path|In case of failure the algorithm will retry along a |different path.
尝试建立到达目的地的机动和跳跃程序。该过程可分为两步：|1 - 寻路分析。|2 - 基于候选路径详细规划。|如果失败，算法会采用不同路径重试。
Attempts to circularize the orbit at the cursor's|location
尝试在光标位置圆化轨道。
Auto BoM scan setting:|Automatically selects servicing or replacement|based on the expected maintenance time|(heavily damaged parts may require very long|repair times)
自动 BoM 扫描设置：|根据预期维修耗时，自动选择维护或更换（严重损坏的部件修理时间可能极为漫长）。
Auto BoM scan setting:|Forces the replacement of damaged parts.
自动 BoM 扫描设置：|强制更换受损部件。
Auto BoM scan setting:|Forces the replacement of heavily damaged parts.
自动 BoM 扫描设置：|强制更换严重受损部件。
Auto BoM scan setting:|Sets the relative* wear threshold below which|a part should be serviced or replaced. |(* to the nominal Estimated Time To Failure)
自动 BoM 扫描设置：|设定一相对* 耗损阈值，低于该阈值的部件记为需要维护或更换。|（*：相对于标称预计无故障时间。）
Auto selects the most accurate navigation signal,|should be "PPS " for docking and undocking.
自动选择最精确的导航信号，对接与脱离时应为『PPS』。

Automatic Flight Planning - CSN 0.8.0|Attempts to devise a sequence of maneuvers and|jumps leading to a given destination orbit.|Expected intial conditions:|- electrical system set|- navigation signal acquired
自动飞行规划 - CSN 0.8.0|尝试设计到达给定目的轨道的机动和跳跃程序。|预期初始条件：|- 电气系统就绪。|- 导航信号已截获。

Automatically generates a destination orbit for|the selected object. Note that this orbit is |"unsynced" by default. That is the true anomaly|is ignored and the planner will try to reach the|orbit at the point that minimizes the ∆V cost.
自动为所选对象生成目的轨道。注意该轨道默认是『非同步』的，这代表忽略真近点角，规划器会尝试在 ∆V 消耗最少的点进入该轨道。
Automatically slightly shortens the suggested |transfer time around ringed planets. This ensures|the trajectory won't collide with the planetary |rings in the usual situation (coplanar operations).
【有星环时霍曼 x0.9】|在有环行星周围转移时，自动略微缩短建议的转移时间。这可确保轨迹不与行星环相撞。
Avionics Pre-Flight Setup - CSN 0.8.0|Prepares the avionics for a future departure|Expected initial conditions:|- Comms and Navigation sensors
航电飞行前设置 - CSN 0.8.0|配置航电以准备离港。|预期初始条件：|- 通信与导航传感器。
1 区电池汇流条电压正常
2 区电池汇流条电压正常
3 区电池汇流条电压正常
Before Departure - CSN 0.8.0|Check the ship's power plant before departure
离港前 - CSN 0.8.0|离港前检查飞船动力装置。
BoM can be generated automatically using|the settings detailed below.
BoM（维修工作单）可以自动生成，下面详述相关设置。
Both the LH2 and LO2 tanks pressurant drain |valves of section 1 must be closed. This prevents|the pressurant from venting into space.
必须关断 1 区液氢和液氧储箱增压排放活门，以免增压气体排入太空。
Both the LH2 and LO2 tanks pressurant drain |valves of section 2 must be closed. This prevents|the pressurant from venting into space.
必须关断 2 区液氢和液氧储箱增压排放活门，以免增压气体排入太空。
Both the LH2 and LO2 tanks pressurant drain |valves of section 3 must be closed. This prevents|the pressurant from venting into space.
必须关断 3 区液氢和液氧储箱增压排放活门，以免增压气体排入太空。
Bring up the cursor menu dialog. Alternatively|click the cursor on the trajectory.
打开光标菜单对话框。或者单击轨迹上的光标。
Bring-up the automatic flight planner interface
调出自动飞行规划器界面。
Bring-up the cursor menu (click the cursor or the|cursor menu button on the editor panel).
打开光标菜单（单击光标，或单击编辑器面板上的光标菜单按钮）。
Brings up the "Max Main Bus Power" checklist
调出『最大主汇流条功率』检查单。
Brings up the "Standard Main Bus Drive" checklist
调出『标准主汇流条供电』检查单。
C M T C U A Heat Sink as required
C M T C U A 热沉：按需
C M T C U A: ON
C M T C U A 开启
C M T C U B Heat Sink as required
C M T C U B 热沉：按需
C M T C U B: On
C M T C U B 开启
C M T C U:A ON
C M T C U A 启动
C M T C U:B On

CSN 飞船管理辅助系统
Check each encounter, the distance should be|larger than 100 km, except for the destination|station.
检查每次交会。除目的地空间站外，最近距离都应大于 100 km。
Check that OTC provided the parameters for|the departure parameters
检查确认 OTC 下发了离港参数。
Check that the Cryogenic Fluids and systems|are ready for operations.
检查低温流体系统是否就绪。
Check that the Electrical System is ready for|operations.
检查电气系统是否就绪。
Check that the Fusion Fuels and systems are|ready for operations.
检查聚变燃料系统是否就绪。
Check that the MRUs are active. The main engine|is capable of thrust vectoring but the MRUs are|still required for attitude control.
检查 MRU 激活。主发动机具有推力矢量能力，但姿态控制仍然需要 MRU 参与。
Check that the Thermal System is ready for|operations. Note: the emergency cooling|protections should be engaged at the reactor|start stage.
检查热控系统是否就绪。注意：应急冷却系统应在反应堆启动阶段接通。
Check the 20 kV and 400 V lines for the main bus|and section 1
检查主汇流条和 1 区的 20 kV 和 400 V 线路。
Check the 20 kV and 400 V lines for the main bus|and section 2
检查主汇流条和 2 区的 20 kV 和 400 V 线路。
Check the 20 kV and 400 V lines for the main bus|and section 3
检查主汇流条和 3 区的 20 kV 和 400 V 线路。
Check the CSM panel for a reported fault from|the device. If so it is the likely cause for the |circuit breaker tripping, and the device is likely|severely damaged.
检查 CSM 面板，查找该设备的故障报告。如果有，该故障可能正是跳开关跳出的原因。设备可能已经严重受损。
Check the ETB (Est. Time to Burn) to the braking|burn. You may reduce the power setting but the|reactor msut be ready in time for the rendez-vous|maneuver.
检查制动点火的 ETB（预计点火时间）。你可以降低反应堆功率，但须确保交会机动时反应堆就绪。
Check the LH2 quantity.|Follow the "Cryo-Fluids Refueling Checklist" if|needed (see below)
检查液氢储量。|按需执行『低温流体加注检查单』（见下文）。
Check the LO2 quantity.|Follow the "Cryo-Fluids Refueling Checklist" if|needed (see below)
检查液氧储量。|按需执行『低温流体加注检查单』（见下文）。
Check the box to add a circularization maneuver|at the next apoapsis / periapsis following the |departure burn. It is automatically activated |around ringed planets to avoid possible collisions.
单击复选框，可自动在离港点火后的下一远拱点 / 近拱点添加圆轨机动。该功能在有环行星附近会自动激活，以避免可能的碰撞。
Check the crew module tanks' liquid nitrogen|quantity.
Check the crew module tanks' liquid oxygen|quantity.
Check the crew module tanks' water quantity.
Check the deuterium quantity.|Follow the "Fusion Fuels Refueling Checklist" if|needed (see below)
检查氘储量。|按需执行『聚变燃料加注检查单』（见下文）。
Check the device's electrical bus, its voltage |should be nominal (around 400V).
检查为设备供电的汇流条，其电压应在标称值附近（400 V 上下）。
Check the device's temperature, its value should |be within 230 K and 370 K.
检查设备温度，应在 230 K 到 370 K 之间。
Check the energy stored in all SMESs. Ideally all 3|should be fully charged. A section should not be|used for a standard fusion start procedure with |less than 75% charge.
检查所有 SMES 储能。最为理想的情况是 3 个全部充满。若某区段 SMES 能量低于 75%，则该区不应参与标准聚变启动程序。
Check the helium-3 quantity.|Follow the "Fusion Fuels Refueling Checklist" if|needed (see below)
检查氦 3 储量。|按需执行『聚变燃料加注检查单』（见下文）
Check the microwave power for the Fusion |Igniters. Higher settings speed-up the start-up |but drain more power from the SMESs.
检查聚变点火器的微波功率。设定功率越高启堆速度越快，但消耗的 SMES 能量也更多。
Check the navigation source, setup the SPS / PPS|receiver if available.
检查导航源。若可用，设置 SPS / PPS 接收机。
Check the position and velocity errors (εpFC, |εvFC). For a jump to succeed the jump-point |must be enclosed by the space anomaly at the|time of the jump. This requires a position |error ≪100 m.
检查位置与速度误差（εpFC, εvFC）。要成功跳跃，跳跃时空间异常必须包裹跳跃点。这要求 ≪ 100 m 的位置误差。
Check the position and velocity errors (εpFC, |εvFC). For a jump to succeed the jump-point|must be enclosed by the space anomaly at the|time of the jump.
检查位置与速度误差（εpFC, εvFC）。要成功跳跃，跳跃时空间异常必须包裹跳跃点。
Check the position and velocity errors after the |maneuver (εpFC, εvFC). Perform a course|correction if needed, typically with multiple|remaining planned legs.
检查机动后的位置与速度误差（εpFC, εvFC），按需（如即将长时间滑行时）执行航线修正。
Check the pressurant quantity.|Follow the "Cryo-Fluids Refueling Checklist" if|needed (see below)
检查增压气体储量。|按需执行『低温流体加注检查单』（见下文）。

Check the projected path to the flaring zone.|Nominal display: ──○─ ─ ─ ─|blue: incoming approach path|green: flaring zone|dashed gray: missed flare path|⤯εp is the lateral error relative to the flaring zone.|A correction is necessary when ⤯εp > 120m
检查到消速区的预计路径。|正常应显示：──○─ ─ ─ ─|蓝色：进近路径|绿色：消速区|灰色虚线：消速失败时的路径|⤯εp 为相对消速区的横向误差。|若 ⤯εp > 120m，则必须执行修正。
Check the systems again if necessary, typically|if resuming operations after some time from |the refueling.
如有必要，再次检查各系统。例如在完成长时间加油后恢复运行时。

Check the translation mode and parameters from|OTC. Standard instructions include:|• a target location to reach (r, α, z) in cylindrical|coordinates)|• the translation mode to use, either without |altitude change constraint (▸rαz) or requiring a|vertical segment followed by a translation at |constant altitude (z▸rα).
检查 OTC 指令的平移模式和参数。标准的指令包含：|• 柱坐标（r, α, z）表示的目标位置。|• 要求使用的平移模式，可以是不限制高度变化的|（▸rαz），或是要求先升降再平移的（z▸rα）。
Check the voltage of the crew module's ESSential|Bus (nominal = 400 V)
检查乘员舱重要汇流条电压（标称值 = 400 V）。
Check whether a device connected to the circuit|is reporting a fault.
检查连接至回路的各设备是否有回报故障。
Check whether the device's power consumption |is acceptable.
检查设备功耗是否在可接受范围内。
Check whether the devive's heat generation|is acceptable
检查设备产热是否在可接受范围内。
Checklist to invoke 20 s prior to Engines Cut-Off|to help manage the state of the power plant|after a burn.
发动机关机前 20 秒时执行的检查单。用于管理关机后动力装置的状态。
Checklist to invoke 8h 30min prior to a jump (cue|available from advisory log). Will help configuring|the jump-drive and power-plant, then monitor|all related operations until the jump.
跳跃前 8 小时 30 分钟时执行的检查单（咨询日志中会出现提示）。用于配置跳跃驱动器和动力装置，并管理跳跃前的所有相关操作。
Checklist to invoke one hour prior to a planned|maneuver (cue available from the advisory log).|The delay is required to plan the reactor spool-up|as required.
计划的机动前一小时时执行的检查单（咨询日志中会出现提示）。这一提前量是规划反应堆按需升功率所必要的。

Click the time qualifier button to circle the|different time display modes |"GTC" = Galactic Coordinated Time|[Interstellar year]⍆[day] - [hh:mm:ss]|"∆🕐⤸" = relative to real time |ex: -01:00:00 = one hour in the past|"∆⍈🕜" = relative to the plan start|ex: +00:00:10 = 10 seconds after the plan start time

Departures can take different paths depending|on the local traffic (from 1 up to 3):|1. single path from the DIP to the departure |point|2. constant z-plane from DIP then on to the |departure point|3. constant z-plane from DIP then on to the |departure lift then to the departure stack

Depending on the above circumstances it is |possible to re-arm the circuit breaker in an |attempt to put the device back online.

During a non-precision departure, a ship is |following OTC's instructions without an initial|flight plan. Planning is started following the |departure burn on the resulting orbit. |Note: a circularization should be inserted at the|apoapsis to prevent a risk of orbspace |incursion around the periapsis.
在非精密离港中，飞船在没有初始飞行计划的情况下，按照 OTC 的引导飞行。飞船结束离港点火，进入轨道后，才开始进行规划。|注意：应该远拱点插入圆轨机动，以防止在近拱点发生轨道空域入侵的风险。
During the maneuvers, the flight controller pilots|the ship to stay on the planned trajectory, based|on the estimated state from the INUs.

Elements imported from the selected object |(ex: ship or station trajectory) when creating the|orbit are accurate. Subsequently editing them will|create discrepancies.

Enable the manual thrust controls to perform the|correction.
启用手动推力输入，以执行修正。

Engage the "DIR▸rαz" translation mode. The |flight controller is now actively piloting the ship|to the arrival point.
接通『DIR▸rαz』平移模式。飞行控制器会主动驾驶飞船前往进港点。
Engage the "TRACK" mode as required to meet|the jump navigation accuracy requirements.

Engage the TRACK mode (MRU) to fine tune|the correction.

Engage the [fusion lock] for the section that will|drive the mais bus next.|Note: the fusion locks block the bus ties controls|when the reactor is running to prevent power |losses on the reactor equipment.
接通预备用于驱动主汇流条的区段的聚变锁【❪☢❫🔒】。|注：聚变锁用于在反应堆运行时锁定汇流条连接器，以防意外操作导致反应堆设备掉电。
Engage the auto-dock translation mode by|clicking the "▲?" button.
单击『▲?』按钮接通自动对接平移模式。

Engage the emergency cooling protection for the|power plant equipment. If triggered the system|starts the pressurant pumps at maximum pressure. |This increases the LH2 flow into the vaporizers for|an extra cooling power around 4 MW.
接通动力装置应急冷却保护。保护动作时，增压气体泵以最大压力启动，从而增加流经蒸发器的的液氢流量，提供约 4 MW 的额外冷却功率。

接通主汇流条过载保护。若某区段 ESCU 过载，且区段内有 FPCU 或 EPCU 运行，此系统会自动将该区段从主汇流条断开。
Engage the pressurant pumps to fill the tanks to|the desired pressure (default = 12 MPa). The|pumps automatically disengage when reaching|the target pressure.
接通增压气体泵，将储箱加注至设定压力（默认 = 12 MPa）。达到目标压力时，泵会自动停止。

H2 supply on. The hydrogen is mixed with the|fusion plasma to generate the "exhaust plasma" in|the EMA chamber. The exhaust plasma thermal|energy is converted into electrical power in the |DECs (magnetohydrodynamic Direct Energy |Convertors) and thrust in the magnetic nozzle.
开启氢气供应。氢气会与聚变等离子体在 EMA 室内混合，生成『排气等离子体』。一部分排气等体在 DEC（磁流体动力直接能量转换器）内将自身热能转换为电力，另一部分经磁喷管产生推力。
He-3 and D2 positive fill flow
氦 3 与氘气加注流量为正。

Helium-3 supply on. He-3 is one of the two input|reactants for the fusion reaction.
氦 3 供应开启。氦 3 是聚变反应的两种输入反应物之一。

氦3 储箱 2 维修准备
氦3 储箱 3 维修准备
Identify the main heat sources in the section then|limit their contribution.
确定此区段的主要热源，然后限制其产热。
If docked establish the wired connection to the|facility (through the docking port interface).
若已对接，与设施建立有线连接（通过对接口界面）。
If equipped and drawing too much power from|the bus, consider manually tripping the device's|circuit breaker. (Select in parts table then CB|button)
若设备从汇流条消耗了过多电力，且设备有跳开关，考虑手动拔出设备跳开关（在部件列表中选中设备，然后操作 CB 按钮）。
If planning from the ship's real time position:|1 - set the time indications as relative to the |current time...
如果从飞船实时位置开始规划：|1 - 将时间显示模式设为相对当前时间……
If relevant, turn the device off.

If replacing parts, starting their manufacturing in|advance while still flying may save time as they|will be readily available for the servicing sequence|when docked. Note that this requires to have negotiated the approach|with the facility. |NB: delayed button, press 3 seconds to engage.
若需更换部件，可在飞行中提前开始制造更换件，以免在对接维护时等待，以节省时间。这需要在进近途中先与设施协商。|注意：延时按钮，长按 3 秒接通。
If required engage the APU fuel cells for 20 MW|of extra power. This will deplete the O2 supply|and is only a temporary measure
按需接通 APU 燃料电池，可获得 20 MW 的额外功率。此操作大量消耗氧气，因此仅为临时措施。
If started on 2 sections out of 3, turn on the|remaining section, ie. the FFI, FPCU, EPCU and |EMI. The FI must remain OFF (plasma ignition is|not required anymore at this stage).
若启堆时仅使用了 3 个区段中的 2 个，此时可以将余下一个区段的 FFI、FPCU、EPCU 和 EMI 也投入运行。FI 不必启动（现阶段不需要为等离子体点火）。
If successfully re-armed and re-started, check |whether the device operation and heat generation|is nominal.
若跳开关重置且设备重启成功，检查设备是否运行正常，产热是否在标称范围。
If successfully re-armed and re-started, check |whether the device operation and power |consumption is nominal.
若跳开关重置且设备重启成功，检查设备是否运行正常，功耗是否在标称范围。
If the ESCU is planned for maintenance, its SMES|should be discharged.
若计划维修 ESCU，必须将其 SMES 完全放电。
If the device is a compromised container (ex |leaking tank) consider transferring its contents|towards redudant systems.
如果设备是一受损容器（例：储箱泄露），考虑将其内容物转移到冗余系统中。
If the device is reporting a possibly related fault,|consider turning it off or disconnecting it. See|the "⚠ Device Fault" checklist.
如果有设备报告了可能相关的故障，考虑关闭或断开失效设备。参见『⚠ 设备失效』检查单。
If the devive is too damaged, make sure it does|not disrupt the remaining online systems.
如果设备受损过重，确保其不会影响其余运行中系统。
If the other sections' cryogenic temperature is|nominal, consider turning the cryogenic cross|heat exchangers to offload the excess heat.
若其余区段低温温度正常，考虑开启低温交叉换热器卸载多余热量。
If the other sections' temperature is nominal, |consider turning the cross heat exchangers to|draw heat from them.
若其余区段温度正常，考虑开启交叉换热器来获取热量。
If the other sections' temperature is nominal, |consider turning the cross heat exchangers to|offload the excess heat.
若其余区段温度正常，考虑开启交叉换热器卸载多余热量。
If the tank or its outlet valve are planned for|maintenance, its contents should be purged.|See Fusion Fuels Purge below.
若计划维修储箱或储箱出口活门，必须清除储箱内容物。参见下文聚变燃料清除。
If the tank or its outlet valve are planned for|maintenance, its contents should be purged.|See LH2 Purge below.
若计划维修储箱或储箱出口活门，必须清除储箱内容物。参见下文液氢清除。
If the tank or its outlet valve are planned for|maintenance, its contents should be purged.|See LO2 Purge below.
若计划维修储箱或储箱出口活门，必须清除储箱内容物。参见下文液氧清除。
If the tank or its outlet valve are planned for|maintenance, its contents should be purged.|See Pressurant Purge below.
若计划维修储箱或储箱出口活门，必须清除储箱内容物。参见下文增压气体清除。
If the temperature of the gas significantly exceeds|its nominal value (100K by default), it it necessary|to empty the tanks prior to refueling.
若气体温度高于标称值（默认 100K）过多，则必须在加注前清空储箱。
If the temperature of the pressurant significantly|exceeds its nominal value (100K by default), it it|necessary to empty the tanks prior to refueling.
若增压气体温度高于标称值（默认 100K）过多，则必须在加注前清空储箱。
If using the MRUs make sure the allocated linear|thrust is larger than the maneuver's target.
如使用 MRU，确保分配的总平移推力大于机动所需。
If using the MRUs make sure the allocated linear|thrust is larger than the maneuver's target|(see below).
如使用 MRU，确保分配的总平移推力大于机动所需（见下文）。

If using the main engine it is very important that|the power level has reached its target (or gone |past) before the maneuver. Otherwise you should|delay the thrust engagement to avoid damaging|the engine.
如使用主发动机，机动前反应堆功率必须达标（或更高）。否则，为避免损坏发动机，你应当推迟接通机动。
If using the main engine set the reactor power |when prompted to (see "Reactor Power-Up Cue|above").
如使用主发动机，在提示出现时设定反应堆功率。|（见上文『反应堆升功率提示』。）
If using the main engine, select the "prepare |reactor power-up sequence" line in the advisory|panel and click the contextual button to add a |timed cue signaling when to start the power-up.
如使用主发动机，选择咨询面板上的『prepare reactor power-up sequence』行，单击其上下文按钮，添加一个升功率定时提示。
In flight establish a radio link to the facility that|will perform the maintenance.
若在飞行中，与计划执行维修的设施建立无线电链路。
In the system map (F3), bring-up the parking |orbit editor tool.
在星系地图（F3）中，调出停泊轨道编辑器工具。
In ventilation mode the ARUs do not perform|any atmosphere treatment. This is used to avoid|conflicting with the station's life support systems|while the hatches are open.
通风模式下，ARU 不对大气进行任何处理。此模式用于在舱口开启时防止与空间站生保系统产生冲突。

Increase the time of departure until it is not |flagged as "Immediate". This indicates that it will|be possible to reach the departure point in time|for the flight plan's start.|NB: minimize the "Transit Time" if possible to|save propellant and energy.
延后离港时间，直到『Immediate』标志消失，这表明能够及时到达离港点。|注意：尽量减少『Transit Time』（中转时间）以节省推进剂和能量。
Indicates whether a departure sequence has been|added to the flight plan using the "Insert |Departure" routine (see planning flow below)
指示是否已使用『Insert Departure』例程将离港程序添加至飞行计划（见下文规划流程）。
Indicates whether an approach sequence has been|added to the flight plan using the "Approach |Target" routine (see planning flow below)
指示是否已使用『Approach Target』例程将进近程序添加至飞行计划（见下文规划流程）。
Initiate the departure burn by clicking the "▲?" |button
单击『▲?』按钮开始离港点火。

插入『精密离港』程序。参见『精密离港规划』流程。

Inserts a course correction to intercept a |jump-point and jump. The editor target must be|a "jump-point locator" from the "Jump Explorer"|tool - OR - a valid jump solution must be loaded|in the "Jump Explorer" tool.
插入航线修正，尝试截获跳跃点并跳跃。|编辑器目标必须是『跳跃浏览器』工具提供的『跳跃点定位器』。|- 或 -|『跳跃浏览器』工具中必须加载了有效的跳跃方案。
Inserts an "approach" sequence to a selected|target. See the "Approach Planning" flow.
插入『进近』所选目标的程序。参见『进近规划』流程。
Invoke the checklist or check the advisory log|for sequencing help.
按咨询日志或机动前检查单作准备。

Maneuvers and Jumps in deep space
Many other phenomena can affect the flight path|such as small errors on the estimated local gravity|field. Another source to be closely monitored is|unexpected gas venting (leaks).
有许多天文现象会影响飞船飞行路径，例如局部重力场的微小波动。此外，还需要密切监控非预期排气（泄露）导致的轨道误差。

Max Main Bus Power (reactor On) - CSN 0.8.0|Connects all sections to the main bus for |maximum electrical power output. |This is typically used to ensure the jump-drive|does not overload the power generators |(polarization phase) and ESCUs (modulation |phase).|Expected initial conditions: standard electrical|configuration with one section driving the main|bus.
最大主汇流条功率（反应堆运行） - CSN 0.8.0|将所有区段连至主汇流条，以最大化电力输出。|通常用于防止跳跃驱动器过载发电机（极化阶段）和 ESCU（调制阶段）。|预期初始条件：标准电气配置，仅单个区段为主汇流条供电。

Monitor the the ⪧[ΔV] and ⪧[T↔] indicators, the|remaining burn ΔV and duration respectively.|Disengage the thrust upon reaching zero.

Monitors the PCU's N2 flow to detect atmosphere|leaks. Nitrogen is inert and therefore losses can|only be due to leaks. However even small changes|of the atmosphere's temperature or composition |can require more N2 to maintain the commanded|pressure. As a result this detector is reliable only in|perfectly steady conditions.
监测 PCU 的氮气流量，以检查是否存在大气泄漏。氮气呈惰性，因此只有泄漏会导致氮气损失。但是，大气温度或成分的微小变化就可导致气压改变，从而需要较多氮气来维持设定气压。因此，这种泄漏探测方式仅在大气完全稳定时可靠。
Most navigation routines from the toolbox|require a target. Select the object on the map|then click [⌖].
工具箱的大多数导航例程都需要一个目标。选择地图上的对象然后单击【⌖】。

Multiple ESCUs (or power generators) are |connected in parallel to the main bus.

NB: degrades with range from the source.
注意：精度随信号源距离增大迅速降低。
NB: that precision is lost after a jump due to the|change in the signals' strengths, relative phases|etc. The system then converges again at the new|location.
注意：跳跃后，因脉冲星信号强度和相对相位变化，定位精度会有所下降。一段时间后系统误差会重新收敛。
NB: to be repeated to link with at least 3 satellites,|4 for optimum accuracy.
注意：再次强调，至少连接 3 颗卫星才能使用，4 颗卫星精度最佳。

Note that the true position error εP is a function|of the navigation and flight control errors|(εpNav and εpFC respectively). The probabilities|indicated here suppose εpFC = 0, i.e. the ship|is on its computed track with εpNav the only|source of uncertainty.

Parts to be replaced require that a new instance|should be manufactured ahead of the |maintenance operations.|Any compatible blueprint can be used for the |printing, provided its Tech Level does not exceed|the manufacturing ability by more than 1|(Enhanced Precision Printing).|The manufacturing process may be started |remotely after negotation with the facility (typ.|during the approach flight).|Please note that part replacement is significantly|more expensive than servicing, even more so if|EPP mode is required.
要更换部件，则需要在维修作业开始前先制造出更换件。更换件可以是任何兼容的部件，但更换件蓝图的技术水平不能高于设施的制造水平，启用增强型精密打印（EPP）则不高于制造水平 + 1。可以远程（例如在进近阶段）与设施协商，提前开始制造更换件。请注意更换远比维护昂贵，启用 EPP 时尤甚。

Pulsars emit highly regular radio signals. The|CSN-F9 is fitted with 3 sets of X-ray telescopes to|use these as a global positioning system. The|processing of these natural signals requires|significant integration times but can reach an|optimum accuracy approaching 200 m rms.
脉冲星发射高度规律的无线电信号。CSN-F9 配有 3 套 X 射线望远镜，可将这些信号用于定位。处理这些自然信号需要大量的积分时间，但完成后最高精度可以接近 200 m 均方根误差。

Reconnects the ESCU to the section's equipment
将 ESCU 重新接入区段设备。
Refer the attitude aim to the ship's main axis. |This ignores the location of the ship's center of|mass and keeps the docking port perfectly |oriented.
设置姿态指向轴为飞船主轴。这将忽略飞船重心的位置变化，使对接口保持对齐。

Refer the attitude aim to the ship's thrust axis. |This orients the ship along the line from the |main engine's nozzle to the ship's center of mass.|As a result a (pitch = 0°, yaw = 0°) aim does not |generate rotational torque.
设置姿态指向轴为飞船推力轴。这将飞船沿主发动机喷管至重心的连线定向，消除推进时的旋转力矩。
Refers to:|1. the location of the flaring zone in the|anchor's orbital frame,|2. the velocity direction and magnitude on final
涉及：|1. 消速区相对于锚点的位置，|2. 最终滑行时的速度方向与大小。
Refill the helium-3 and deuterium gas tanks |(fusion fuels)
重新填充氦 3 和氘储箱（聚变燃料）。
Refill the liquid hydrogen and oxygen tanks.|(reaction mass and APU fuel)
补加液氢与液氧储箱（工质与 APU 燃料）。
Refuel the liquid hydrogen (LH2), liquid oxygen|(LO2) and pressurant gas tanks
加注液氢（LH2），液氧（LO2）和增压气体储箱。
相对飞行中转设置完成

Release the [fusion lock] for the section that was|driving the mais bus.|Note: the fusion locks block the bus ties controls|when the reactor is running to prevent power |losses on the reactor equipment.
解除之前驱动主汇流条的区段的聚变锁【❪☢❫ 🔓】。|注：聚变锁用于在反应堆运行时锁定汇流条连接器，以防意外操作导致反应堆设备掉电。

Release the [fusion lock] for the section that will|drive the main bus next.|Note: the fusion locks block the bus ties controls|when the reactor is running to prevent power |losses on the reactor equipment.
解除预备用于驱动主汇流条的区段的聚变锁【❪☢❫ 🔓】。|注：聚变锁用于在反应堆运行时锁定汇流条连接器，以防意外操作导致反应堆设备掉电。
Release the [fusion lock] for the sections to |disconnect from the main bus (2 out of 3).
解除要从主汇流条断开的区段（3 选 2）的【聚变锁】。
Release the [fusion lock] protecting the sections |currently not connected to the main bus.
解除当前未接入主汇流条的区段的【聚变锁】。
Release the docking port to undock.
解锁对接口以脱离对接。
Release the fusion lock for the sections to disconnect
解除待断开区段聚变锁
Release the safety lock when the reactor is|running (prevents unwanted shut down of |critical equipment)
安全锁用于防止关键设备在反应堆运行时意外断电。

向交通管制请求目标空间站的进近信息。
Request the departure information from OTC
向 OTC 请求离港信息。
Request the navigation data from the anchor|object. (The communication protocol is |automated)
向锚点请求导航数据（系统会自动处理通信协议）。
Reset the gain to 0 dBi (no antenna gain) to |receive signals from all bearings.
将增益重置为 0 dBi（无天线增益），以全向接收。
Resets the elements to a default circular orbit|with a = 1.5 * parent body radius
重置轨道根数为默认的 a = 1.5 倍父天体半径的圆轨道。
Retrieve the Estimated Time of Arrival to the|flaring zone for submission to Traffic Control
获取抵达消速区的预计时间，以供提交至交通管制。

主汇流条：设回标准配置
Return the main bus to a standard configuration|=1 single ESCU connected to the main bus, all|[fusion locks] engaged.
主汇流条标准配置 = 单 ESCU 接入主汇流条，所有【聚变锁】接通。
Return the reactor to idle power if relevant.
若必要，将反应堆设回慢车功率。
Return the thrust controller to idle
Review the departure parameters and create|the departure plan.
检查离港参数，然后创建离港计划。

S P S 接收机开启

SPS constellations come in two variants:|• SRPS: short range, SRPS channel (UHF)|• LRPS: long range, LRPS channel (SHF)|The link with LRPS satellites generally requires|significant RX antenna gain and indivdual|targeting. SRPS constellations can be used|with a single slot at minimum RX gain.
SPS 星座分为两类：|• SRPS：近程，SRPS 频道（UHF）。|• LRPS：远程，LRPS 频道（SHF）。|一般而言，LRPS 卫星信号需要高增益配合单目标跟踪才能接收。SRPS 则可以只用一个槽位，以最小的增益接收整个星座的信号。

SPS/PPS Setup flow - CSN 0.8.0|Describes how to setup a comms unit to receive|SRPS and PPS positioning signals.|Expected initial conditions:|- electrical system up and running|- at least one commu unit operational
SPS/PPS 设置流程 - CSN 0.8.0|描述如何设置通信组件，以接收 SRPS 和 PPS 定位信号。|预期初始条件：|- 电气系统上电并运行。|- 至少一个通信组件可用。

基于自动 BoM 扫描设置（见下文），扫描飞船所有需要维修的部件。
Section #1 and/or #1 must be up (this is a partial|shut-down)

区段 #1 和 / 或区段 #2 必须开启（此程序是部分停机程序）。
Section #2 and/or #3 must be up (this is a partial|shut-down)

See "Precision Departure" below.|This panel section defines the necessary |parameters to insert a departure sequence at the|start of the plan.
参见下文『精密离港』。|若要在计划开头插入离港程序，则用此面板区域设定程序参数。

See "Precision Departure" below.|Use the (r, α, z) selectors to add an offset to the|trajectory at the starting time. The cylindrical|coordinates are defined in the orbital frame |(radial, prograde, normal), with:|• r the distance from the norma axis|• α the clockwise angle from the prograde |direction|• z the elevation w.r.t the orbital plane.
参见下文『精密离港』。|使用（r, α, z）旋钮为起始时刻的轨迹添加相对偏移。偏移量柱坐标基于轨道参考系（径向，顺向，法向）定义：|• r 为到法线轴的距离。|• α 为从顺向顺时针转过的角度。|• z 为相对于轨道平面的高度。
See the "Orbit as Target" section below about|the synced / unsynced toggle.
有关同步 / 非同步模式切换，参见下文『轨道作为目标』章节。

选中航节 +【⊏●】光标转到航节

选择某一活动组件的 A、B、C 或 D 槽位。|面板（顶部）控件会关联到所选槽位。
Select slot A, B, C or D on active unit. |The panel's controls (top) are then connected |to that slot.

Select slot A, B, C or D. The panel's controls (top)|are then connected to that slot.

Select the "Approach" mode for relative flight, |typically around stations. (click the selector)

选择 Beacon（信标）消息标签页。

Select the Rendez-Vous mode to prepare|the braking burn back on the teack.

Select the active WPSU (A or B) as required. The|units are fully redundant, select one as per the|current maintenance strategy.
按需激活 WPSU（A 或 B）。装置是全冗余的，依当前设备维护策略选用一台即可。
Select the appropriate mode for the chosen thrust|method: "MVR" if using the main engine, no |constraint if using the MRUs
按所选推力方式选择恰当模式：使用主发动机选择『MVR』，使用 MRU 则无限制。
Select the appropriate mode for the chosen thrust|method:|- "MVR MAIN" for the main engine|- "MVR MRU" for the maneuvering thrusters|- "TRACK" for low-∆V' course corrections using |the MRUs
按所需推力方式选择恰当模式：|- 使用主发动机选择『MVR MAIN』。|- 使用机动推力器选择『MVR MRU』。|- 使用 MRU 执行低 ∆V 航线修正选择『TRACK』。
Select the departure station on the map (left click,|double click to zoom and track). If this is the |station the ship is currently docked to, you can |use the [▽] button to do so.
在地图上选择离港空间站（左键单击，双击可缩放并跟踪）。如果该站是飞船当前对接的空间站，你可以使用【▽】按钮。
Select the desired destination on the system map|or in the helm view.

Select the desired type of docking port.

Select the destination body on the map (left click).|When the ultimate goal is a station, pick its |parent planet or moon. The final approach |requires a dedicated routine considering safety |issues and likely to be performed under the |authority of the Space Traffic Controllers.|See the "Approach Planning" flow.
在地图上选择目的天体（左键单击）。如果最终目标是空间站，选择其父行星或卫星。规划最终进近需要使用考虑了安全问题的专用例程，且一般需要空间交通管制的授权。参见『进近规划』流程。
Select the destination station on the map and set|it as the editor target [⌖]

如果有多个航节，选择最后一个。它应是一个稍微偏心的转移航节，位于空间站离港点火后。

Servicing refers to general maintenance and |repairs. |- Initially undamaged parts are fully restored to|their nominal characteristics.|- The functionality of damaged parts is restored,|however repairs degrade their Estimated Time To|Failure (ETTF). The amount of this unrecoverable |damage depends on the Tech Level differential |between the part and the facility performing the|repairs.
维护是指一般性的维修和修理。|- 将未损坏部件完全恢复至标称性能。|- 恢复受损部件的功能，但部件预计无故障时间（ETTF）降级。降级不可恢复，程度取决于受损部件与修理部件的设施之间的技术水平差距。
设定飞控，准备离港机动
Set plan starting time = current time + delay, |as defined by the delay selector.
设定计划开始时间 = 当前时间 + 延迟，延迟由延迟旋钮设定。
Set plan starting time = map time
设定计划开始时间 = 地图时间
Set starting time = cursor time.|This timestamp corresponds to the time after |which the planner may insert maneuvers.
设定开始时间 = 光标时间。该时间之后规划器方可插入机动。
Set starting time = plan time + selected |departure delay (initial conditions = plan ⍈⤴)
设定开始时间 = 现有计划的开始时间 + 所选出发延迟（初始条件 = 现有计划 ⍈⤴）
Set starting time = real time + selected |start delay (initial conditions = ship current ▽⤴)
设定开始时间 = 实时 + 所选起始延迟（初始条件 = 飞船现状 ▽⤴）
Set the Antenna gain control to auto. This|increases the reception range by focusing the|beam onto the signal source as required.
将天线增益控制设为自动。这将使波束按需聚焦于信号源，从而增加接收距离。
Set the Attitude to Prograde for an Outward|departure or Prograde + REV switch for inward
对于升轨离港，选择 Prograde（顺向），对于降轨离港，选择 Prograde 并接通 REV 电门。
Set the Attitude to Prograde for an outward|departure or Prograde + REV switch for inward
对于升轨离港，选择 Prograde（顺向），对于降轨离港，选择 Prograde 并接通 REV 电门。
Set the Centralized Systems Monitoring to the|docked mode.
设定中央系统监控为对接模式。
Set the Centralized Systems Monitoring to the|flight mode. This should not trigger abnormal|conditions prior to undocking.
设置中央系统监控为飞行模式。该操作不应在对接脱离前触发异常状况。
Set the H2 and O2 circuits. They are both needed|for the Auxiliary Power Units. Hydrogen will also |be used as propellant by the maneuvering |thrusters.
设定氢气与氧气回路。辅助动力装置需要二者。机动推力器使用也氢作为推进剂。
设定导航球模式为『进近』。
Set the NavOrb mode to "Plan".|This indicates the position and velocity error w.r.t|the planned trajectory.
设定导航球模式为『Plan』（计划）。这将显示飞船相对预定轨迹的位置与速度误差。
Set the airflow as required, the stronger the more|coupling with the station's atmosphere (and |wear on the ventilation system).
按需设定风量。风量越大与空间站大气混合越快（通风系统耗损也越快）。
Set the attitude aim (pitch and yaw) to Approach.
设定姿态指向（俯仰和偏航）为进近。
Set the attitude aim (pitch and yaw) to Approach.|This will keep the ship aligned with the docking|port. (rotate the selector)
设定姿态指向（俯仰和偏航）为进近。这将使飞船与对接口保持对齐（转动旋钮）。
Set the attitude control to TRK.MAIN. |NB: this does not engage the controller yet to let|you adjust the maneuver parameters.
设定姿态控制为 TRK.MAIN。|注意：该操作不会马上接通控制器，以便你调整机动参数。
Set the attitude roll (pitch and yaw) to Approach.
Set the attitude roll to Approach. This will keep |the ship aligned with the docking port. (rotate the|selector)
设定姿态滚转为进近。这将使飞船与对接口保持对齐（转动旋钮）。

Set the desired NavOrb mode, typically:|- [Circ] to display the DeltaV to a circular orbit at|the location|- [Tgt] after selecting the departure station to |monitor its distance before starting the reactor.
按需设置导航球模式。典型设置：|[Circ] 显示当前位置到圆轨道所需速增量。|[Tgt] 可在启动反应堆前用于查看与出发空间站的距离。
Set the docked station to fill mode (D2 and |He-3 positive pressure)
将所对接的空间站设为加注模式（氘气和氦 3 供应压力为正）。
Set the electrical system for departure
设定电气系统以准备离港。
Set the flare parameters as instructed by OTC|(preferred method)
按 OTC 指示设定消速参数（推荐）。
Set the flight controls for departure
设定飞行控制以准备离港。
Set the flight display to "glide" to visualize the|arrival path to the flaring zone.
将飞行显示器设至『滑行』模式，以可视化到 Flaring Zone（消速区）的进港路径。
Set the main bus for maximum power
主汇流条：最大功率配置
Set the main bus for maximum power =|all main bus ties ON, all [fusion locks] engaged.|The jump drive will be supplied by all online |generators (DECs).
主汇流条最大功率配置 = 所有主汇流条连接器 ON，所有【聚变锁】接通。跳跃驱动器由所有并网的发电机（DEC）供电。
Set the minimum time at which the planner is|allowed to start maneuvering. This should be used|to manage delay like a reactor start-up time for |instance.
设定规划器应至少在多久后插入机动。该功能可用于处理反应堆启动等时间延迟。
Set the orbit object as the automatic flight|planner's target
将轨道对象设为自动飞行规划器目标。
Set the orbit object as the target for the Flight |Editor and Nav Toolbox routines.
将轨道对象设为飞行编辑器和导航工具箱例程的目标。
Set the planned propellant mass (LH2 tanks), |default is 100%. If planning to carry some extra |payload, take its mass into account for a more |accurate planning.
设置计划的推进剂（液氢）质量，默认 100%。如果计划携带额外载荷，考虑其质量以使规划更加准确。
Set the planned time of departure [∆🕐⤸]
Set the planned time of departure as the map|time.
用地图时间设定计划离港时间。
Set the priority of the operations as required.|The [High] and [Emergency] (highest) settings|will allocate more of the facility resources for|a significant extra cost.
按需设定作业优先级。|设为【High】（高）和【Emergency】（紧急，最高）会使设施分配更多资源，报价也更贵。
Set the reactor power as required by the flight|plan.
参考飞行计划按需设定反应堆功率。
Set the reactor power to 1 GW , 2 GW for jump|space anomalies with radius > 250 m. This will|be necessary to generate enough electrical power|to supply the jump-drive.
反应堆功率设定至 1 GW，如跳跃空间异常半径 > 250 m，设至 2 GW。这是给跳跃驱动器供应充足电力所必须的。
Set the reactor power to 200 MW to prepare for i|its shut-down and wait for it to settle.
反应堆功率调定 200 MW，以准备停堆。
Set the reactor power to its minimum setting|to prepare for its shut-down
反应堆功率设至最小值，以准备停堆。

Set the reference object or "anchor" for the |approach mode. It sets the origin for all relative|coordinates. By default the docked station is set|as candidate, otherwise select the desired object |in the helm view or on the system map.
设定进近模式的参照物（即『锚点』）。这设定了所有相对坐标的原点。默认情况下，所对接的空间站自动作为候选。也可在驾驶视角或星系地图选择所需对象。

Set the reference object or "anchor" for the |approach mode. It sets the origin for all relative|coordinates. Select the desired object |in the helm view or on the system map, then click|the "Select/Clear Anchor" button.
设定进近模式的参照物（即『锚点』）。这设定了所有相对坐标的原点。在驾驶视角或星系地图选择所需对象，然后单击『选择/清除锚点』按钮。
Set the relay selection to auto (the comms unit|will select the closest OTC relay).
将中继选择设为自动（通信组件会自动选择最近的 OTC 中继站）。
Set the selected part for replacement (toggle).
将所选部件设为更换（单击切换）。
Set the selected part for servicing (toggle).
将所选部件设为维护（单击切换）。
Set the systems following the maintenance.

Set the target radius for the jump-space anomaly|(centered on the jump-drive). It should enclose |the ship (> 100 m) and factor in εpNav to limit|the risk of failure. The chances of success are:|r = 0.5 * εpNav: 55 %|r = 1.0 * εpNav: 85 %|r = 1.5 * εpNav: 98 %|This is supposing that εpFC (the deviation from |the planned trajectory) is negligeable at the |jump-point.
设置跳跃空间异常的目标半径（以跳跃驱动器为中心）。该半径须包裹飞船（> 100 m），并以 εpNav 为比例设置，以最小化失败风险。成功率计算如下：|r = 0.5 * εpNav: 55 %|r = 1.0 * εpNav: 85 %|r = 1.5 * εpNav: 98 %|上述计算假设 εpFC（与预定轨迹的偏差）在跳跃点可以忽略不计。
Set the thrust controller to HOLD MAIN but do|not engage yet (no thrust)
设定推力控制器为 HOLD MAIN，但先不要接通（无推力）。
Set the thrust for the CCI maneuver, typ: 300 kN|(Thrust Ctrl table, 2nd line)
设置 CCI 机动的推力。典型值：300 kN（推力控制表第二行）
Set the thrust level as required
Set the thrust level, typically 1 kN when correcting|small errors at the beginning of the glide.|3rd line ⨺: increment control|2nd line ⨺: value control
设定推力等级。通常用 1 kN 来修正滑行起始阶段的小误差。|第三行 ⨺：调节增量|第二行 ⨺：调节数值
Set the thrust mode back to "idle" = the stand-by|mode for free orbital flight.
自由轨道飞行时，设置推力模式为『IDLE』= 待命模式。
Set the thrust to 40 kN for a typical MRU burn|(maneuvering thrusters).
设置推力为 40 kN，用于典型的 MRU 点火（机动推力器）。
Set the time of departure as required. |If flagged as "immediate" the undocking will|follow if traffic allows.|NB: minimize the "Transit Time" if possible to|save propellant and energy.
按需设定离港时间。如果出现『Immediate』，表明若交通状况允许，将立即脱离对接。|注意：尽量减少『Transit Time』（中转时间）以节省推进剂和能量。
Set the time of departure as the current time|+ the time delay from the selector
选择计划离港时间，即当前时间 + 旋钮给定的时间延迟。
Set the ventilation as required. A higher flow |yields more atmosphere processing (and more|ARU wear).
按需设定通风量。风量越大，大气处理速度越快（ARU 耗损也越快）。
Sets the Centralized Systems Monitoring to the|"docked" configuration.
将中央系统监控设为『对接』配置。
Sets the D2 manifold to refill configuration|(all valves open)
将氘气总管设为补加配置（所有活门打开）。
Sets the D2 manifold to stand-by configuration|(all valves closed)
将氘气总管设为待命配置（所有活门关断）。
Sets the He-3 manifold to refill configuration|(all valves open)
将氦 3 总管设为补加配置（所有活门打开）。
Sets the He-3 manifold to stand-by configuration|(all valves closed)
将氦 3 总管设为待命配置（所有活门关断）。
Sets the docked station to purge mode (zero|pressure)
将所对接的空间站设为清除模式（供应压力为零）。
Sets the docked station to stand-by mode (D2 and |He-3 zero pressure).
将所对接的空间站设为待命模式（氘气和氦 3 供应压力为零）。
Sets the pressurant manifold for refueling|(check valves groups below)
将增压气体总管设为补加配置（检查下列活门）。
Sets the pressurant manifold for stand-by
将增压气体总管设为待命配置。
Setup the OTC comms as required
按需建立 OTC 通信链路。
Setup the comms for Orbital Traffic Control|operations
建立与轨道交通管制的通信。
Setup the comms to access the station's services.
建立通信以访问空间站服务。
Setup the navigation sensors (determining the|ship's location).
设置导航传感器（确定飞船位置）。
Show the Comms Slot Selection dialog
显示通信槽位选择对话框。
Since all celestial objects are in constant motion|flight plans are completely time determined. As|a result all tools must be provided with a time|reference (through their specific UI).
由于所有天体都在持续运动，要确定飞行计划就必须确定时间。因此，必须为所有工具提供时间基准（通过工具各自的界面）。
Since the ship's estimated state vector is limited|by the navigation sensors, initial trajectory|projection errors accumulate over time.|This is to be monitored closely under XPR|navigation.
飞船测量自身状态矢量的精度受限于导航传感器，这导致从当前状态矢量出发的轨迹预测必然带有误差，且会随时间逐渐积累。使用 XPR 导航时应密切监控此类误差。
Snaps the maps back to the current real time
将地图绑定至当前时间。
Spool-up the reactor to prepare the Course|Correction Injection burn.|Typ: 40 GW for 300 kN of thrust
提升反应堆功率，准备航线修正注入点火。|典型设置：300 kN 推力用 40 GW。
Standard Main Bus Drive (reactor On) - CSN 0.8.0
标准主汇流条供电（反应堆运行） - CSN 0.8.0
Standard Main Bus Drive (reactor On) - CSN 0.8.0|Reverts from the "Maximum Main Bus Power" |configuration.

Start a new plan with a precision departure |sequence.
以一个精密离港程序开始新的计划。
Start the jump-space polarization process by|activating either one of the jump-drives. The |jump-space is a spherical space anomaly that|must eventually contain the whole ship before the|jump.
启动任一跳跃驱动器，开始跳跃空间极化过程。跳跃空间是一球形空间异常，必须在跳跃前包裹整艘飞船。
Start the servicing procedure (delayed button;|press for 3 seconds).
开始维护程序（延时按钮，长按 3 秒）。

Starts a new plan with the provided parameters |and inserts a departure sequence (i.e. a departure|burn and an optional circularization at the |following apoapsis or periapsis)|- orbital elements|- starting time|- initial relative position|- departure parameters
使用以下参数新建计划，并插入离港程序（即离港点火和其后的远拱点 / 近拱点圆轨）：|- 轨道根数。|- 开始时间。|- 初始相对位置。|- 离港参数。
Starts a new plan with the provided parameters:|- orbital elements|- starting time|- initial relative position
使用以下参数新建计划：|- 轨道根数。|- 开始时间。|- 初始相对位置。
主汇流条连接器 #1 的状态。
主汇流条连接器 #2 的状态。
主汇流条连接器 #3 的状态。

Submit an Approach Request with the chosen|ETA. In case of no traffic conflict OTC will|validate the approach and provide a window|for the time of entry into the destination's |restricted orbital space.
用所选 ETA 提交进近请求。若没有交通冲突，OTC 会批准进近，并提供进入目的地的限制轨道空域的时间窗口。
Submit the BoM to the targeted facility, this will|take some upload time as the encrypted |blueprints are transmitted.
将 BoM 提交到目标设施，上传加密的部件蓝图会花费一些时间。
Suggested Approach Velocity: 2 meters per second
建议进近速度：2 米每秒
Supply H2 to either manifold A or B. Hydrogen is|used by the ARUs in the CO2 methanation process|(Sabatier reactor).
将氢气供应至 A 或 B 总管。ARU 将氢气用于二氧化碳甲烷化过程（萨巴蒂尔反应器）。
Supply N2 to either manifold A or B. Nitrogen is|used by the PCUs to regulate the crew module|atmosphere's total pressure.
将氮气供应至 A 或 B 总管。PCU 使用氮气调节乘员舱大气总压。
Supply O2 to either manifold A or B. Oxygen is |used by the PCUs to control the crew module|atmosphere's ppO2 (partial pressure of oxygen).|(Note: temporary, waiting for the WELUs)
将氧气供应至 A 或 B 总管。PCU 使用氧气调节乘员舱 ppO2（氧分压）。|（注：临时设计，等 WELU 上线）
Sweep time with 'sync cursor with time' on
扫掠时间时启用『同步光标与时间』
Switch off the main bus tie for the sections to disconnect
断开相应主汇流条连接器
Switch the charge mode to off.
Switch the station's 20 kV source back on (this|should have been be done automatically).
重新开启空间站的 20 kV 电源（此操作应自动完成）。
Switch the station's 20 kV source off. This sets it|to a standard 100 MW discharge mode.
关断空间站的 20 kV 电源，使其进入标准 100 MW 放电模式。
Switch to another section to drive the main bus|with a full LO2 reserve if needed
按需将主汇流条供电转换至液氧储量较满的区段。
T C C U 1 Power: Max
T C C U 1 功率：最大
