TCCU #1 will automatically adjust its power|according to the thermal load, up to its maximum|rating.
TCCU #1 会根据热载荷，在额定范围内自动调节功率。
TCCU #1 will automatically adjust its power|according to the thermal load.
TCCU #1 会根据热载荷自动调节功率。
TCCU #2 will automatically adjust its power|according to the thermal load, up to its maximum|rating.
TCCU #2 会根据热载荷，在额定范围内自动调节功率。
TCCU #2 will automatically adjust its power|according to the thermal load.
TCCU #2 会根据热载荷自动调节功率。
TCCU #3 will automatically adjust its power|according to the thermal load, up to its maximum|rating.
TCCU #3 会根据热载荷，在额定范围内自动调节功率。
TCCU #3 will automatically adjust its power|according to the thermal load.
TCCU #3 会根据热载荷自动调节功率。
THEN: set the (r, α, z) target (cylindrical coors)|‣ r is the radius from the anchor's axis|‣ α is the clockwise angle from the orbital velocity|‣ z is the altitude relative to the orbital plane
然后：设定目标（r, α, z）（柱坐标）。|‣ r 是距锚点半径。|‣ α 是自轨道速度方向顺时针转过的角度。|‣ z 是相对轨道平面的高度。
TRACK MAIN 航线修正完成
Target currently docked facility if relevant.
若必要，以当前对接的设施作为目标。
Target the desired orbital facility and establish|the radio link.
以所选轨道设施为目标建立无线电链路。
Temporarily inactivates the audio alarms during|the cold start procedure
在冷启动过程中临时禁用声音警报。
Temporarily inactivates the audio alarms during|the procedure
执行此程序时临时禁用声音警报。
Temporarily inactivates the audio alarms during|the servicing operations.
维护过程中临时禁用声音警报。

The "Approach Target" nav task is specifically |designed for the command of fusion powered|ships. It produces a flight sequence that |concludes on a low ∆V "glide" path to the target|that can be managed with the maneuvering|thrusters. All high-power burns are performed|at a safe distance prior to getting on the final|glide path.
『Approach Target』（进近目标）导航任务是专门为聚变动力飞船所设计的。它生成的飞行程序最终以低 ∆V 路径『滑行』至目标，使用机动推进器便足以完成交会。所有的大功率点火都在安全距离外，于最终滑行前完成。
The "Flight Analyzer" evaluates the characteristics|of a flight as a function of the departure time:|flight time, number of jumps, estimated ∆V
『飞行分析器』以出发时间为自变量评估飞行数据：飞行时间、跳跃次数、预计 ∆V。

The "Flight Editor" provides the tools for |manual and assisted edition of the flight plan.|"Assisted" relates to the semi-automatic routines|that help manage common navigation tasks.|See dedicated "Editor and Nav Toolbox" help
『飞行编辑器』提供手动或辅助编辑飞行计划的工具。『辅助』是指半自动例程，可处理常见导航任务。|见『编辑器与导航工具箱』帮助。
The "Route Finder" operates on the galaxy map|and builds long distance routes = sequences |of flights from refueling station to station.
『航路查询器』用于在银河地图上构建长途航路 = 站到站经停加油的飞行程序。

The "Route Finder" tool relies on fast path finding|algorithms to devise sequences of flights with|refueling stops to manage high ∆V galactic |routes. All proposed solutions must then be|validated using standard flight planning (the|process can be automated).
『航路查询器』工具依靠快速寻路算法设计带有经停加油的飞行程序，生成高 ΔV 银河航路。该工具生成的解必须再经标准飞行规划验证可行性（验证过程可以自动化）。
The "TRACK 10 min" button engages the course|correction mode for 10 min. In this mode the |flight guidance system will return the ship onto|the planned trajectory using the MRUs.
『TRACK 10 min』按钮会自动接通航线修正模式 10 分钟。该模式下飞行制导系统会使用 MRU 将飞船修回预定轨迹。
The APP velocity should match the Departure|Information request sent to OTC
APP 速度应与提交至 OTC 的离港请求信息相匹配。
The Atmosphere Revitalization Units are fully|redundant, select a single one for standard|operations. That selection should|match that of the H2 manifold.
大气再生装置是全冗余的，标准运行时仅需选用一个。装置选择需匹配氢总管设定。

The Atmosphere Revitalization Units:|- ventilate the crew module's air|- regulate the atmosphere's temperature|- capture the carbon dioxide exhaled by the crew|- filter out particles and noxious gases|- maintain the relative humidity level
大气再生装置（ARU）：|- 提供乘员舱通风。|- 调节大气温度。|- 捕集乘员呼出的二氧化碳。|- 滤除颗粒物和有害气体。|- 维持相对湿度。

The CMTCUs can dump their output heat to:|- the power plant's equipment heat pipe (and |then to the main radiators through the TCCUs)|- the crew module's radiator|If no other specific requirements apply, selecting|the sink of lowest temperature will optimize the|power consumption and wear.
CMTCU 可将废热排至：|- 动力装置的设备区热管（随后通过 TCCU 排入主散热器）。|- 乘员舱散热器。|若没有特殊需求，建议选择温度最低的热沉，以优化能耗和设备耗损。
The CSN-F9 features a full set of flight planning|tools which are presented in the following |sections.
CSN-F9 具有全套的飞行规划工具，以下是这些工具的介绍。
The CSN-F9 is designed to deliver a ∆V budget|of 100 km/s at a0 = 2.14 m/s² (Initial Acceleration|rating). Flights exceeding that endurance will |require refueling stops.
CSN-F9 的设计目标是在 a0 = 2.14 m/s2（额定初始加速度）下提供 100 km/s 的 ∆V 预算。超过这一预算的飞行需要经停加油。
The CSN-F9's Flight Management System|operates according to the "Plan then Fly"|concept. Information about the flight planning |tools is available in the indicated section.
CSN-F9 的飞行管理系统按照『先计划后飞行』的概念运行。|有关飞行规划工具的信息，可参见具体检查单章节。
The Centralized Systems Monitoring must be set|to the docked mode.
中央系统监控必须设为对接模式。
The Crew Module Thermal Units are fully |redundant. For normal operations activate one|single unit.
乘员舱热控组件采用全冗余配置，正常运行时只需激活单个组件。
The ESCU of section #1 should be connected to|the main bus.
1 区 ESCU 应接入主汇流条。
The ESCU of section #2 should be connected to|the main bus.
2 区 ESCU 应接入主汇流条。
The ESCU of section #3 should be connected to|the main bus.
3 区 ESCU 应接入主汇流条。
The ESSential Power Units supply the crew |module's equipment. During standard operations|their batteries should remain fully charged.
重要电源装置（ESSPU）为乘员舱设备供电。标准运行作业期间其电池应始终保持充满。
The Energy Storage and Conditioning Units' |batteries (power plant) should always remain fully|charged and be used in emergency situations|only.
（动力装置的）储能与调节组件（ESCU）的电池应始终保持充满，且仅在紧急情况下使用。
The Flight Controller's auto-pilot maintains the|ship on the desired track for an optimum |efficiency.
飞行控制器的自动驾驶仪高效地维持飞船处于预定轨道。

The Fusion Igniters are automatically switched|off when the fusion power equals the injected|microwave power, of if the remaining stored |energy in the SMESs gets smaller than the |Ignition Energy Reserve threshold.
当聚变功率等于注入的微波功率，或 SMES 的总剩余能量低于点火能量保留阈值时，聚变点火器自动关闭。
The H2 Circuit must have been set. Invoke the|checklist as needed.
氢气回路必须就绪。按需执行检查单。
The H2 manifold pressure should be nominal.
氢气总管应达到标称压力。

The INUs also aggregate the available navigation|sources into a single signal that is fed to the|flight controller to represent the ship's current|state. They automatically select the most|accurate source, including their own dead-|reckoning projection whenever relevant.
INU 还负责融合所有可用导航源，向飞行控制器输出飞船当前状态。INU 会根据精度自动选取导航源（包括自身航位推算结果）。

The INUs feature high-precision accelerometers|and laser gyroscopes for all 6 degrees of freedom|of the ship’s motion (3 translations, 3 rotations).|The sensed data is then continuously integrated |to infer the ship’s current state (position,|velocity, attitude) without the need for an|external reference.|Errors accumulate over time so that function|is continously self-calibrating based on the most|accurate available signal source.
INU 内有高精度加速度计和激光陀螺仪，可测量飞船运动的六个自由度（3 移动，3 转动）。飞船的当前状态（位置、速度、姿态）可由测量数据连续积分得到，无需外部基准。但随着时间推移，积分误差会不断累积，因此 INU 会参考精度最高的可用外部信号源不断自校准。
The INUs will use the best available signal to|self-calibrate. At this point the high-precision|Proximity Positioning System should be selected.
INU 会使用精度最佳的可用信号执行自校准。正常情况下选中的应是高精度的邻近定位系统（PPS）。

The Inertial Navigation Units must have |completed their calibration process. The cal |number is an indication of the unit's drift in |inertial mode. "1.0" indicates a nominal |performance (typically a few tens of meters per |hour)
惯性导航组件必须已完成校准。组件的校准值表示组件在惯性模式下的漂移率。『1.0』表示漂移率在标称范围内（通常为每小时数十米）。

The Inertial Navigation Units process the signals|from the active sensors (XPR, SPS, PPS) to |compute the ship's location and orientation.|When no reference is available 3 accelerometers |and 3 laser gyroscopes let them integrate the laws|of motion to continue estimating the ship's|position and velocity. These inertial updates are |not error -free and some drift accumulates over |time. The optimum performance is achieved after|a calibration process using a navigation sensor as|reference. The more accurate the better (PPS).
惯性导航组件负责处理来自活动传感器（XPR、SPS、PPS）的信号，据此计算飞船的位置和朝向。如果传感器均不可用，惯组会使用内置的 3 台加速度计和 3 台激光陀螺仪的数据，根据运动定律对其积分，从而持续估测飞船位置与速度。这种惯性导航存在误差，且会随时间累积产生漂移。因此，惯组需要先参考导航传感器执行校准，才能达到最优性能。用于校准的传感器精度越高越好（如 PPS）。

The Initial relative position and Departure |parameters are transmitted by OTC as part of the|standard "Precision Departure" procedure. |The OTC comms panel provides a shortcut to|transfer the data automatically.|Follow the link for information about "Precision"|and "Non-precision" departures.
在标准『精密离港』程序中，OTC 会提供初始相对位置和离港参数。OTC 通信面板提供了一个快捷按钮，用于自动转移这些数据。点击查看有关『精密』与『非精密』离港的信息。
The LH2 and LO2 tanks must be depressurized so|they can be filled again (port supply source|pressure > tank pressure condition).
必须先释压液氢与液氧储箱，才能对其进行加注（要求港口供应压力 ＞ 储箱压力）。
The LH2 cross valves must be open
液氢交输活门必须打开。
The LH2 pumps must be OFF
The LH2 tank #1 must be pressurized for a correct|operation of the LH2 cryo-pump. If not activate|the passive pressurization system (see below)
液氢箱 #1 必须增压，液氢低温泵才能正常运行。如果增压不正常。激活被动增压系统（见下文）。
The LH2 tank #2 must be pressurized for a correct|operation of the LH2 cryo-pump. If not activate|the passive pressurization system (see below)
液氢箱 #2 必须增压，液氢低温泵才能正常运行。如果增压不正常。激活被动增压系统（见下文）。
The LH2 tank #3 must be pressurized for a correct|operation of the LH2 cryo-pump. If not activate|the passive pressurization system (see below)
液氢箱 #3 必须增压，液氢低温泵才能正常运行。如果增压不正常。激活被动增压系统（见下文）。
The LH2 tanks valves must be open
液氢储箱活门必须打开。
The LO2 cross valves must be open
液氧交输活门必须打开。
The LO2 pumps must be OFF
The LO2 tanks valves must be open
液氧储箱活门必须打开。
The MECO (Main Engine Cut Off) sequence |often slightly deviates from the nominal profile,|especially at high thrust. This leaves the ship|with a velocity error that accumulate over time.
MECO（主发关机）程序常常略微偏离标称推力剖面，大推力时尤甚。这使飞船的末速度产生误差，进而随着时间累积导致航线偏离。
The O2 manifold pressure should be nominal.
氧气总管应达到标称压力。
The Parking Orbit Editor generates map objects|that can be used either as targets for the planning |routines or starting conditions for flight plans.
停泊轨道编辑器用于生成轨道地图对象。这些轨道对象既可以作为规划例程的目标，也可以作为飞行计划的起始条件。

The Pressure Control Units maintain the crew|module's:|- ppO2 (partial pressure of oxygen) to 21 kPa|- total pressure to the selected setting (defaut| 100 kPa)|The units are fully redundant, select a single one|for standard operations. That selection should|match that of the N2 and O2 manifolds.
气压控制装置（PCU）维持乘员舱的：|- ppO2（氧分压）至 21 kPa。|- 总压至设定值（默认 100 kPa）。|装置是全冗余的，标准运行时仅需选用一个。装置选择需匹配氮气和氧气总管设定。
The SMES should be charge so the ESCU can drive|the section while powering-up.
SMES 应已充电，从而允许 ESCU 在启动期间为区段供电。
The Superconducting Magnetic Energy Storage|units should be fully charged. They will power the|ship until the reactor is started.|Follow the SMESs Charge Checklist below |if needed
超导磁储能装置应完全充满。其将在反应堆启动前为飞船供能。按需执行 SMES 充电检查单。

The X-Ray Pulsar Receivers use the ultra-stable|periodic radio emissions from millisecond x-ray |pulsars as "galactic GPS" signals. Their accuracy|is limited to about 200 m rms and is achieved |after long integration times (multiple hours). |However they are available everywhere and serve|as a backup navigation signal source that is fed to|the Inertial Navigation Units.|The XPRs also feature optical "star trackers" used |to compute the ship's orientation.
X 射线脉冲星接收机处理来自毫秒 X 射线脉冲星的超稳定周期射电辐射，将其用作『银河 GPS』信号。它们的精度上限约为 200 m 均方根误差，且这一精度需要长时间（数小时）积分才能达到。但其不受地域限制，随处可用，因此被作为一路备份导航信号输入惯性导航组件。XPR 还配有一组光学『星跟踪器』，用于计算飞船姿态指向。

The ability to specify a plan's initial conditions |independently of the ship's current state allows|for exploratory and anticipated planning. This|might include preparing a plan while still docked|or evaluating a ∆V budget before comitting to|a mission for instance.
导航系统具有独立于飞船当前状态指定计划初始条件的能力，因此可用于探索性和预期性的规划工作。 例如，在对接时准备计划，或在执行任务之前评估 ΔV 预算。
The accuracy of the dead-reckoning projection|degrades over time and depends on the initial|calibration.
航位推算的精度取决于初始校准精度，且会随时间推移不断下降。

The approach angle relative to the orbital plane.|> 0° = "climbing" approach, below the plane|< 0° = "descent" to the target, above the plane|Pay careful attention to this parameter at ring |stations (physical separation by the planetary |rings!). If the chosen docking port is below the |plane you'll need a positive slope.
【进近坡度】|相对于轨道平面的进近角度。|> 0° = 从平面下方『爬升』进近。|< 0° = 从平面上方『下降』进近。|在星环空间站需要额外注意该参数（因为空间站上下部分被行星环物理分隔！）。例如若所选对接口低于轨平面，则你需要选择正的坡度。

The approach course measured clockwise relative| to the orbital velocity of the target (0°). As a |result the rendez-vous point is placed as +180°. |That is crs = 340° leads to an arrival placed at 160° |from the orbital velocity.
【进近航向】|目标的轨道速度方向（0°）顺时针测量至进近速度方向的夹角称为进近航向。一般与进港方位相差约 180°。例如：进近航向 340，则进港点大致位于 160 方位。
The arrival point altitude relative to the target|(cylindrical coordinates)
【消速高度】|进港点与目标的相对（柱坐标）高度。
The arrival point azimut relative to the target|(cylindrical coordinates)
【消速方位】|进港点与目标的相对（柱坐标）方位。
The arrival point radius relative to the target|(cylindrical coordinates)
【消速距离】|进港点与目标的相对（柱坐标）半径。
The attitude controller should remain engaged at|all times.
姿态控制器必须全程接通。
The automatic "Flight Planner" computes flights|= a sequence of maneuvers and jumps|that lead to a given destination orbit. |See dedicated "Automatic Flight Planning" flow
自动『飞行规划器』用于计算飞行 = 前往给定目的轨道的一系列机动与跳跃。|见『自动飞行规划』流程。
The automatic flight planner is the preferred tool|when preparing journeys from one location to |another.
若准备从一个地点前往另一个地点，自动飞行规划器是首选工具。
The batteries of the ESSential Power Units should|be fully charged.
各重要电源装置（ESSPU）的电池应完全充满。
The batteries should always remain fully charged|and be used in emergency situations only.
电池应时刻保持充满，仅在紧急情况下使用。
The bearing angle is measured clockwise from|the orbital velocity vector (0°). The departure |point should be located within a [0° .. 90°] arc.
方位角是指从轨道速度矢量（0°）顺时针转过的角度。离港点应位于【0° .. 90°】范围内。

The carbon dioxide exhaled by the crew is toxic|and must be removed from the module's|atmosphere. For standard operations use the|methanation process that has H2 reacting with|CO2 to yield water vapor and methane (CH4)|in the ARUs' Sabatier reactor. (The methane is|vented while the water can be recovered).
乘员呼出的二氧化碳有害，必须从舱内清除。标准运行时建议使用甲烷化反应：氢气与二氧化碳在 ARU 的萨巴蒂尔反应器内反应，生成水蒸气和甲烷（CH4）（甲烷排出舱外，水则可以回收利用）。
The configuration can be used in the situations|listed below. In these cases the notification can|be ignored.
此配置可用于以下状况，处于这些情况时可忽略此通知。
The configuration temporarily occurs when |switching the main bus supply from one|equipment section to another.
转换主汇流条的供电区段时，会短时间处于此配置。
The constant thrust used during the departure|maneuver.
离港机动使用的推力，恒定值。
The created flight plan corresponds to the free|fall orbit starting at the departure location and|time. The procedure adds the maneuvers to get|away from the station.
当前的飞行计划只含有一条在离港时间起始于离港点的自由落体轨道。添加离港程序以添加离开空间站的机动。
The crew module's ESSential Power Units are fully |redundant. For normal operations activate one|single unit.
乘员舱的重要电源装置（ESSPU）采用全冗余配置，正常运行时仅需激活单个装置。
The cryogenic heat exchangers [1-2] and [2-3]|must be on to maintain the section's cryogenic|temperature while the TCCU is down.
必须开启【1-2】和【2-3】低温换热器，以在 TCCU 关闭期间维持区段低温回路温度。
The cryogenic heat exchangers [1-2] and [2-3]|should be off as the section's cryogenic circuits|are controlled by its TCCU.
应关闭【1-2】和【2-3】低温换热器，使区段低温回路温度由本区 TCCU 控制。
The cryogenic heat exchangers [1-3] and [2-1]|must be on to maintain the section's cryogenic|temperature while the TCCU is down.
必须开启【1-3】和【2-1】低温换热器，以在 TCCU 关闭期间维持区段低温回路温度。
The cryogenic heat exchangers [1-3] and [2-1]|should be off as the section's cryogenic circuits|are controlled by its TCCU.
应关闭【1-3】和【2-1】低温换热器，使区段低温回路温度由本区 TCCU 控制。
The cryogenic heat exchangers [1-3] and [3-2]|must be on to maintain the section's cryogenic|temperature while the TCCU is down.
必须开启【1-3】和【3-2】低温换热器，以在 TCCU 关闭期间维持区段低温回路温度。
The cryogenic heat exchangers [1-3] and [3-2]|should be off as the section's cryogenic circuits|are controlled by its TCCU.
应关闭【1-3】和【3-2】低温换热器，使区段低温回路温度由本区 TCCU 控制。
The departure course is the thrust vector's angle |from the orbital velocity, measured clockwise. |Typical is 0° (prograde burn).
离港航向，指从轨道速度到离港推力矢量的顺时针夹角。通常为 0°（顺向点火）。
The departure flight plan must have been loaded |into the flight controller
离港飞行计划必须已经载入飞行控制器。
The departure maneuver ∆V (change of orbital|velocity). Typical is 30 m/s which provides a good|trade-off between energy drain and separation |rate from the station.
离港机动 ∆V（轨道速度改变量）。通常设为 30 m/s，以兼顾能量消耗和离港速度。

The departure slope is the thrust vector's |elevation angle w.r.t the orbital plane. |Typical is +/- 10° at ring stations, away from the |orbital plane (+ above, - below). |Otherwise use 0° (orbital ring and space elevator |stations).
离港坡度是指离港推力矢量相对于轨道平面的仰角。在星环空间站通常设为 +/- 10° 以远离轨道平面（+ 向上，- 向下）。其他情况设为 0°（轨道环或太空电梯站）。

The desired duration of the transfer leg to the final|glide. By default it is set to a Hohmann setting |(optimum from circular to circular). The following|line provides an estimation of the total approach|time and ∆V cost
转移航节到最终滑行的时间。默认设定值对应霍曼转移（从圆轨到圆轨的最优方案）。下面一行显示估计的总进近时间和 ΔV 成本。
The device is out of order.

The distance between the starting point of the|braking maneuver to the glide path and the |target. 300 km usually provides enough margin to|avoid breaking the 100 km minimum distance |rule with a live reactor.
滑行段进入制动的起始点到目标的距离。一般而言，300 km 的余量足以避免违反 100 km 的最小停堆距离规定。
The elevation is measured relatively to the orbital|plane. The departure point's elevation typically|matches that of the starting docking port.
高度是指相对于轨道平面的高度。离港点高度通常与起始对接口持平。
The empty tanks can now be filled.
现在可以加注清空的储箱了。

The epoch (reference time) for the orbit depends|on the selected object at the creation:|• celestial object: epoch = 📏🕜 (map time)|• ship or station: epoch = 🕐⤸ (real time)|See the nav station information about the map|time controls.
轨道的历元（基准时间）基于创建时所选的对象：|• 天体：历元 = 📏🕜（地图时间）。|• 飞船或空间站：历元 = 🕐⤸（实时）。|参见导航站有关地图时间控制的相关信息。
The flight controller should automatically engage|the "⥤ DIP" mode = controlled flight toward the |Docking Ingress Point, along the corridor leading|out of the station's restricted flight region.
飞行控制器应自动进入『⥤ DIP』模式 = 沿穿过空间站限飞区的走廊，朝对接入口点飞行。
The flight controller suggests a mode and|settings for the coming maneuver, as indicated|on the flight plan panel. You may overrule the|suggestion as you see fit.
飞行控制器会在飞行计划面板上给出建议的机动模式与设置，你可以视情况采纳。
The flight controller will brake to the arrival point|as required and then automatically switch to the|"HOLD" station mode
飞行控制器会在进港点完成制动，然后自动转换到『HOLD』（位置保持）模式。
The flight planning tools are organized into three|main layers.
飞行规划工具分为三个主要层次。
The gates are umbilicals extending from the|station's terminal and connecting to the ship's|airlocks. Once properly secured they pressurize|to provide a safe passageway.
廊桥是从空间站的航站楼伸出，连接到飞船气闸的脐带。连接完成后，廊桥会加压，成为一条可安全通行的通道。
The heat exchangers [1-2] and [2-3] must be on to|maintain the section's temperature while the |TCCU is down.
必须开启【1-2】和【2-3】换热器，以在 TCCU 关闭期间维持区段温度。
The heat exchangers [1-2] and [2-3] should be off|as the section's temperature is controlled by its|TCCU
应关闭【1-2】和【2-3】换热器，使区段温度由本区 TCCU 控制。
The heat exchangers [1-3] and [2-1] must be on to|maintain the section's temperature while the |TCCU is down.
必须开启【1-3】和【2-1】换热器，以在 TCCU 关闭期间维持区段温度。
The heat exchangers [1-3] and [2-1] should be off|as the section's temperature is controlled by its|TCCU
应关闭【1-3】和【2-1】换热器，使区段温度由本区 TCCU 控制。
The heat exchangers [1-3] and [3-2] must be on to|maintain the section's temperature while the |TCCU is down.
必须开启【1-3】和【3-2】换热器，以在 TCCU 关闭期间维持区段温度。
The heat exchangers [1-3] and [3-2] should be off|as the section's temperature is controlled by its|TCCU
应关闭【1-3】和【3-2】换热器，使区段温度由本区 TCCU 控制。
The inner hatches can now be closed to minimize|the atmosphere leakage.
现在可以关闭内舱口，以减少大气泄漏。

The jump explorer is an advanced low-level tool |that searches for and analyses jump solutions |given departure and/or destination bodies. It also|provides the associated virtual trajectory objects |necessary to plan jumps (jump-points are in |motion).
跳跃浏览器是高级的底层工具，可以搜索分析给定出发地和 / 或目的天体的跳跃方案。它还提供了规划跳跃所需的虚拟轨迹对象（跳跃点在时刻运动）。

The larger the thrust the lower the ISP. Therefore|the detailed router will always try to find solutions|with the smallest possible thrust and re-try with|a larger acceleration if failing. Tune these inputs|based on your ship's power plant performance.
【经济 / 正常 / 最大】推力|推力越大，比冲越低。因此，求解时，寻路器会从最小可用推力开始逐步递增推力。根据飞船动力装置的性能来调整这些参数。

The liquid nitrogen and liquid oxygen only|partially fill their tank's available volume, with the |remainder containing their vapor in pressure|equilibrium. The resulting "saturating vapor |pressure" is strongly dependent on the|temperature, which is used to pressurize the|tank as required.|Table's [●] shortcut at the top left
液氮和液氧储箱设计为不会完全注满，储箱的剩余空间用于容纳饱和蒸汽。『饱和蒸汽压』取决于温度，因此系统使用温度来控制储箱压力。|表的左上角有开启全部温控的快捷方式 [●]。
The magnetic energy storage coils will start to|charge as soon as their superconductors have|reached their operating temperature.
一旦超导体到达其工作温度，超导磁储能线圈就将开始充电。
The main bus must be driven by section 1 or 2.|Perform a Drive Switch as required.
主汇流条必须由 1 或 2 区供电。按需执行供电转换。
The main bus must be driven by section 1 or 3.|Perform a Drive Switch as required.
主汇流条必须由 1 或 3 区供电。按需执行供电转换。
The main bus must be driven by section 2 or 3.|Perform a Drive Switch as required.
主汇流条必须由 2 或 3 区供电。按需执行供电转换。

The main bus powers the MRUs that will be used|to rendez-vous with the station and dock. Make |sure it is connected to a section with a running|APU and maximum LO2 reserve. This will|compensate part of the energy consumed by the |thrusters.
主汇流条为 MRU 供电，MRU 用于交会对接空间站。确保主汇流条连至 APU 运行，且剩余液氧最多的区段，这可以补偿部分推力器耗能。
The main bus should be connected to the |station's grid and the SMESs charging.|Follow the checklist as needed.
主汇流条应已连接至空间站电网，且 SMES 正在充电。按需执行检查单。
The main power generators require the reactor|to be running.
反应堆运行时主发电机才能工作。
The maintenance options can be manually set|for each specific part.
可以为每个特定部件手动设置维修选项。

The majority of the celestial bodies along the|galactic routes are equipped with constellations|of radio positioning satellites. Their signals are|received by the comms units and fed to the SPS|controller.
银河航路沿线的多数天体都配有无线电定位星座。通信组件可以接收这些卫星的信号，供 SPS 控制器使用。
The minimum radius ensures that the whole ship|is enclosed in the polarized jump space. It is set to|100 m
保证飞船被极化的跳跃空间完全包裹的最小半径。该半径为 100 m。
The navigation error should be defined |(∞ means that the flight controller does not |receive positioning information).
导航误差应有定义（∞ 意为飞行控制器未收到定位信息）。
The navigation signal is the positioning data|source for the flight controller. Make sure it is as|accurate as possible during docking and |undocking procedures.
导航信号是飞控的定位数据源。应确保其在对接与脱离过程中尽可能准确。
The navigation station can display its maps for |any value of the time parameter. This lets you|visualize the positions and motions of all the|displayed objects.
导航站可以显示任一时间的地图。允许你可视化所有对象的位置和运动。

The nominal temperature for the cryogenic |circuits is 22 K, and may take up to 4 hours to |reach. However superconducting devices|may operate as high as 45 K (as long as the |superconducting state has been achieved)
低温回路的标称温度是 22 K，可能需要 4 小时的冷却才能达到。不过，超导设备最高可以工作在 45 K（此时进入超导状态）。

The orbits' table provides an overview of the|currently selected orbit object. Scroll to browse|the existing objects (or click the ▲▼ arrows).|A double-click on the parent body name zooms|to the location.
轨道表提供当前所选轨道对象的概览。可用滚轮（或单击 ▲▼ 箭头）浏览现存轨道对象。在父天体名称上双击可缩放至其位置。
The passive pressurization system should be |reserved for emergencies.
被动增压系统应留作应急使用。

The pathfinding algorithm estimates the flight |times for each segment as it progresses towards|the destination. This parameter adjusts the |timing pressure on its planning heuristic. The |smaller the value the larger the pressure.
【飞行时间乘数】|寻路算法会估计每个航段到目的地的飞行时间。此参数用于调整算法启发式规划时的时间压力。数值越小压力越大。
The phases in a full station-to-station flight with|the CSN Type 9 Frigate.
CSN 9 型护卫舰执行站到站飞行的各飞行阶段。

The plan's starting time ⍈🕜 can be set relatively|to the current time or from the map time. It is|indicated in absolute GTC format at the bottom|right of the panel's section.|See the Nav Station help for the different types|of time indicators.
计划的开始时间 ⍈🕜 既可以取自当前时间 + 延迟，也可以取自地图时间。开始时间以绝对 GTC 格式显示在面板右下角。参见导航站关于时间显示的帮助。
The planned trajectory sets a 1:1 relation between|space and time. As such placing the cursor (left|click) sets the map to the time corresponding to|the selected location.
预定轨迹在空间和时间之间确定了一对一关系。因此，放置光标（左键单击）会将地图设为该位置所对应的时间。

The power on each section is provided by the |following sources, in the given order:|1. TPV|2. DEC|3. APU|4. ESCU (drawing energy from the SMES)|If the section is driving the main bus, its FPCU|or ECPU are in use and the total load exceeds the|total power generation then the "Main Bus|Overload Protection" will trigger and trip the|main bus tie-breaker to prevent a plasma|confinement failure.
各区段的电力负荷按如下顺序分配至各电源，优先级从高到低：|1. TPV|2. DEC|3. APU|4. ESCU（消耗 SMES 储能）|若某一区段为主汇流条供电，同时其 FPCU 或 EPCU 运行，则一旦该区段总负荷超过总发电量，其『主汇流条过载保护』就会动作，使区段的主汇流条连接器断开，以免发生等离子体约束失效。
The pressurant bleed valves must be closed
增压引气活门必须关断。
The pressurant cross valves must be open
增压气体交输活门必须打开。
The pressurant tanks valves must be closed
增压气体储箱活门必须关断。
The pressurant tanks valves must be open
增压气体储箱活门必须打开。
The pressurization valves for the LH2 tanks must|be closed
液氢储箱的增压活门必须关断。
The pressurization valves for the LH2 tanks must|be closed before the refueling phase. The low |pressure ensures the tanks can be refilled.
必须关断液氢箱增压活门才能进入加注阶段。此时储箱内处于低压状态，可以正常加注。
The pressurization valves for the LH2 tanks must|be open to purge their pressurization circuits.
必须开启液氢箱的增压活门，才能排空储箱的增压回路。
The pressurization valves for the LO2 tanks must|be closed
液氧储箱的增压活门必须关断。
The pressurization valves for the LO2 tanks must|be closed before the refueling phase. The low |pressure ensures the tanks can be refilled.
必须关断液氢箱增压活门才能进入加注阶段。此时储箱内处于低压状态，可以正常加注。
The pressurization valves for the LO2 tanks must|be open to purge their pressurization circuits.
必须开启液氧箱的增压活门，才能排空储箱的增压回路。

The purpose of the "Flight Analyzer"' is to|determine the optimum launch time for a|selected flight. Like the Route Finder it relies|on euristic path finding methods and its findings|must be validated using the detailed flight|planning tools.
『飞行分析器』的用途是确定某一飞行的最佳出发时间。它和航路查询器一样，都依赖于启发式寻路算法，因此分析器的结果必须经具体飞行规划工具验证。
The radius is the distance from the station's |vertical axis (the normal to the orbital plane).|The typical departure distance is 2000 m.
半径是指与空间站垂直轴（轨道平面的法线）的距离。典型离港距离是 2000 m。
The radius of the anomaly Rj must be large|enough to compensate for the position error εP.|The probability of success are summarized below:
异常的半径 Rj 必须大到足以补偿位置误差 εP。跳跃成功概率可按如下计算：
The reactor must be up and at idle power.
反应堆必须运行，且处于慢车功率。
The reactor should be started on the two sections NOT driving the main bus.
应使用不为主汇流条供电的两区启动反应堆

The required minimum collision-free coasting |flight time at a jump exit. The planner checks for|collisions and will insert the necessary maneuvers|to prevent them. However this parameter adds |some safety margin in case of a system |malfunction that would limit the ship's |maneuvering capability during the flight.
【安全等级】|跳跃后的最小无碰撞滑行时间。规划器会检查碰撞并插入必要的规避机动。该参数增加了一些应对系统失效的安全裕度。但会限制飞船的机动能力。

The second tier features specialized routines|to perform the most common planning tasks|(circularizations, transfers etc...) They insert and|adjust maneuvers and jumps according to a set|of user goals and parameters.|They are listed in the "Nav Toolbox" and accessed|via the trajectory cursor.
第二层是各类专用例程，用于执行最常见的规划任务（圆轨、转移等）。它们根据用户输入的目标和参数，插入并调整机动和跳跃。这些例程列在『导航工具箱』中，工具箱可以从轨迹光标处打开。
The section's cryo-pump should be On.
The section's cryogenic circuit temperature is |getting too high. The connected superconducting|devices may get severely damaged.
此区段低温回路温度过高，回路上的超导设备可能严重受损。
The section's equipment temperature is getting|too high. Some devices may cease to function|imminently.
此区段设备温度过高，一些设备随时可能失效。
The section's equipment temperature is getting|too low. Some devices may cease to function|imminently.
此区段设备温度过低，一些设备随时可能失效。
The section's main energy storage is discharging.|Loss of power on the connected buses is |imminent.
此区段的主储能器即将放电殆尽，其连接的汇流条随时可能掉电。
此区段的主磁流体动力发电机。
The section's thermal control unit should be on.
此区段的热控组件应保持开启。
The section's thermal control unit should be on.|It can also heat the section as required.
此区段的热控组件应保持开启，热控组件能按需为区段加温。
The serviced parts are reset during the operations.|This is likely to require adjustments to restore the|desired configuration.
维护作业期间会对受维护部件进行重置，维护后需要按需恢复部件配置。
The ship's reactor is about to be shut down.|Make sure the position and velocity errors (εpFC, |εvFC) are small enoughi to limit the build-up of|a significant error along the final glide.
飞船的反应堆即将关闭。确保位置与速度误差（εpFC, εvFC）足够小，不会在最终滑行阶段积累过大误差。
The signals from at least 3 satellites (4 for best|accuracy) are necessary for the SPS receiver to|derive a navigation signal.
SPS 接收机至少需要 3 颗卫星的信号（4 颗精度最佳），才能输出导航信号。
The standard procedure is to start the reactor on|on the 2 sections not powering the main bus. The|remaining one (driving the main bus) is kept in|reserve, typically to supply MRU burns.
标准程序为：使用两个不为主汇流条供电的区段启动反应堆，保留余下一个（驱动主汇流条的）区段供应 MRU 点火。
The start delay for the [∆⍈🕜] button
The starting position and velocity can be defined|from two different sources.
可以从两个不同的来源定义起始位置和速度。

The station has two maps: galaxy and system.|To go to the galaxy map click the [🌀] button.|Similarly, in the galaxy map click the [💫] button|to descend into the selected system (or double|click on the map).
导航站有两张地图：银河和星系。|单击【🌀】按钮进入银河地图。|类似地，在银河地图中单击【💫】按钮进入所选星系（或在地图上双击）。
The system will automatically start an emergency|reactor shut down (plasma venting) when |detecting a confinement failure.
此系统会在探测到约束失效时，自动执行反应堆紧急停止（排空等离子体）。
The tanks' pressurization valves must be open.
储箱增压活门必须打开。
The temperature regulation of the tanks is using|the cryogenic circuit as heat sink. Turn these |systems off to temporarily reduce the load on the|cryogenic coolers.
储箱温控系统使用低温回路作为热沉。临时关闭该系统以减轻低温制冷机负载。
The thermal control system should be up and|running: all TCCUs on, nominal temperatures.|Follow the checklist if needed.
热控系统应已上线运行：所有 TCCU 开启，温度在标称范围内。按需执行检查单。
The thrust controller must be engaged
The thrust controller must be in idle mode prior|to a jump.
跳跃前，推力控制器必须置为 IDLE 模式。
The thrust controller should remain engaged at|all times.
推力控制器必须全程接通。
The thrust level for the main burns:|- initial transfer injection|- braking to final glide
主要点火的推力：|- 初始转移注入。|- 最终滑行段进入制动。

The trajectory propagator projects the ship's|path from a starting state vector and a set of |maneuvers and jumps.|Manual flight planning consists in editing these|elements directly. This is done using the Flight |Editor [✎•⍈•]
轨迹预报模型使用起始状态矢量、机动和跳跃来预测飞船的路径。使用飞行编辑器【✎•⍈•】直接编辑这三者，即为手动飞行规划。
The vaporisation and heating of the LH2 into|gaseous hydrogen at equipment T° is a major|source of cooling in the CPVs.
CPV 的制冷量主要来自于液氢气化升温至设备 T° 这一过程。
The ∆V for the final rendez-vous at the target|(end of the glide path). This maneuver will have|to be performed with the MRUs only, with the|reactor offline.
【消速 ∆V】|（滑行路径末端）与目标最终交会所需的 ∆V。消速机动只能在反应堆离线状况下由 MRU 执行。
Then click [⤸{⚓} at ⌖ from cursor]. The routine|computes the nearest encounters with all stations|around the target's parent body from the location|of the cursor.
然后单击【⤸{⚓} at ⌖ from cursor】，该例程会从光标位置开始，计算飞船与目的天体附近所有空间站的最接近交会。
然后选择【↘⚓ Approach target】（进近目标）。
然后选择【☰ Nav Toolbox】（导航工具箱）。
There are many ways to place the cursor onto the|trajectory:
把光标放到轨迹上的方法有很多：
Thermal Control Setup - CSN 0.8.0|Sets the thermal controls systems for normal |operations|Expected initial conditions:|- electrical system powered up
热控设置 - CSN 0.8.0|按正常运行要求设置热控系统。|预期初始条件：|- 电气系统上电。
Thermal control system in nominal configuration
热控系统处于正常配置。
Thermophotovoltaic generator, operating at|high reactor temperature only.
热光伏发电机，仅在反应堆高温时工作。
This configuration is useful when the load from|the main bus exceeds the power generation from|one section:|- jump-drive charge at low reactor power|- MRU maneuver
当主汇流条上的负载超过单个区段的发电能力时，可应用此配置：|- 反应堆低功率时充能跳跃驱动器。|- MRU 机动。

This parameter adjusts the penalty cost for jumps|with large ∆V in the pathfinding heuristic. This is|to model the extra cost of very long recovery |burns after jumps. The larger the value the lower|the penalty, which might help reduce the number |of jumps for some trips.
【高成本跳跃 ∆V】|该参数调整寻路启发算法中高 ΔV 跳跃的成本惩罚，以模拟跳跃后非常长的改出点火所带来的额外成本。值越大，惩罚越低，这可能有助于减少某些行程的跳跃次数。
This will reduce the plasma pressure, as a |trade-off with neutron generation.
此操作将以中子产量为代价，降低等离子体压力。
To cope with the complexity of orbital navigation,|the CSN-F9's avionics is based on the "Plan then |Fly" concept.
为了应对轨道导航的复杂性，CSN-F9 的航电基于『先规划再飞行』的概念。
To preserve the charge in SMES #1, the equipment|in section 1 (stand-by mode) will be powered |through the main bus. This step connects the|equipment to the main bus and its driving |section.
使用主汇流条为（待机状态的）1 区设备供电，以保留 SMES #1 的电量。此步骤连接待机设备、主汇流条和供电区段。

To preserve the charge in SMES #1, the equipment|in section 1 (stand-by mode) will be powered |through the main bus. This steps disconnects the|ESCU from the circuit and makes sure no SMES|discharge will occur.
使用主汇流条为（待机状态的）1 区设备供电，以保留 SMES #1 的电量。此步骤将 ESCU 从电路中断开，确保 SMES 不再放电。
To preserve the charge in SMES #2, the equipment|in section 2 (stand-by mode) will be powered |through the main bus. This step connects the|equipment to the main bus and its driving |section.
使用主汇流条为（待机状态的）2 区设备供电，以保留 SMES #2 的电量。此步骤连接待机设备、主汇流条和供电区段。

To preserve the charge in SMES #2, the equipment|in section 2 (stand-by mode) will be powered |through the main bus. This steps disconnects the|ESCU from the circuit and makes sure no SMES|discharge will occur.
使用主汇流条为（待机状态的）2 区设备供电，以保留 SMES #2 的电量。此步骤将 ESCU 从电路中断开，确保 SMES 不再放电。
To preserve the charge in SMES #3, the equipment|in section 3 (stand-by mode) will be powered |through the main bus. This step connects the|equipment to the main bus and its driving |section.
使用主汇流条为（待机状态的）3 区设备供电，以保留 SMES #3 的电量。此步骤连接待机设备、主汇流条和供电区段。

To preserve the charge in SMES #3, the equipment|in section 3 (stand-by mode) will be powered |through the main bus. This steps disconnects the|ESCU from the circuit and makes sure no SMES|discharge will occur.
使用主汇流条为（待机状态的）3 区设备供电，以保留 SMES #3 的电量。此步骤将 ESCU 从电路中断开，确保 SMES 不再放电。
To switch between the elliptic and hyperbolic|modes, move the slider all the way to the ecc = 1|threshold.
要在椭圆模式和双曲线模式之间转换，调整离心率直到其到达阈值 ecc = 1。
To the minimum, O2 supply should be made|available to the APU of the section powering|the main bus (MRUs). Typically this should be|the section with the largest LO2 reserve.
应至少向为主汇流条（MRU）供电的区段的 APU 供应氧气。通常应使用剩余液氧最多的区段。
Traffic Control grants access to the destination's|orbspace when the reactor is offline.
反应堆离线后，交通管制下发轨道空域进入许可。
Transfer the flight instructions to the flight |controller
将飞行指令发送至飞行控制器。
Turn On the Auxiliary Power Units (Fuel Cells). |They will provide power while the reactor is |offline.
启动辅助动力装置（燃料电池），其在反应堆启动前为飞船供电。
Turn On the Auxiliary Power Units (Fuel Cells). |They will provide power while the reactor is |offline. To the minimum the section powering |the main bus (MRUs) should have its APU ON.
启动辅助动力装置（燃料电池）。它们会在反应堆离线期间提供电力。应至少启动向主汇流条（MRU）供电的区段的 APU。
Turn off the Thermal Control Unit in section 1|(the temperature will be maintained by the heat|exchangers)
关闭 1 区热控组件（温度将由换热器维持）。
Turn off the Thermal Control Unit in section 2|(the temperature will be maintained by the heat|exchangers)
关闭 2 区热控组件（温度将由换热器维持）。
Turn off the Thermal Control Unit in section 3|(the temperature will be maintained by the heat|exchangers)
关闭 3 区热控组件（温度将由换热器维持）。
Turn off the docking port's fluids supply .
Turn off the docking port's fluids supply |(H2, LH2, LO2)
关断对接口的流体供应（H2、LH2、LO2）。
Turn off the emergency cooling protection for the|power plant equipment.
关闭动力装置设备的应急冷却系统。
Turn off the port's H2 supply. The hydrogen gas |will be collected by the station.
关断港口的氢气供应。氢气会被回输至空间站。
Turn off the port's LH2 supply. The station will|collect the tanks' content.
关闭港口的液氢供应。空间站会抽出储箱内容物。
Turn off the port's LO2 supply. The station will|collect the tanks' content.
关闭港口的液氧供应。空间站会抽出储箱内容物。
Turn on the Maneuvering Reaction Units, which |provide attitude and translation thrust.|They are powered by the main bus and use |hydrogen from their respective section as |propellant.
启动提供姿态和平移推力的机动反作用组件。它们由主汇流条供电，并使用各自区段的氢气作为推进剂。
Turn on the Maneuvering Reaction Units.
Turn on the Thermal Control Unit in section 1
Turn on the Thermal Control Unit in section 2
Turn on the Thermal Control Unit in section 3
Turn on the docking port's fluids supply |(H2, LH2, LO2, He-3, D2)
开启对接口的流体供应。|（H2、LH2、LO2、He-3、D2）
Turn on the port's H2 supply.
Turn on the port's H2 supply. Gaseous hydrogen|is used to pressurize the LH2 tanks.
开启港口的氢气供应。气氢用于增压液氢储箱。
Turn on the port's LH2 supply.
Turn on the port's LO2 supply.
Turn on the port's water supply.
Turn on the ship's radio-communications units.|Each one of them provides 4 software slots to |handle multiple links over different channels|simultaneously.
启动飞船的无线电通信组件。每个组件提供 4 个软件槽位，可同时在多个频道建立复数链路。
Turn the port's water supply off, this places the|station in water collection mode.
关断港口供水，这会使空间站处于水回收模式。
Turn-off the attitude controller (click the selector)
关闭姿态控制器（单击旋钮）。
Turn-off the thrust controller (click the selector)
关闭推力控制器（单击旋钮）。
Turn-on the refrigeration units (300 K equipment|heat-pipes) and the cryogenic-coolers (24 K|circuits: superconducting devices, cryo tanks)
打开制冷组件（300 K 设备热管）和低温制冷机（24 K 回路：超导设备、低温储箱）。
Turns off the Exhaust Mass Injector for section 1 |(hydrogen). This is automatically compensated |by the other active sections.
关闭 1 区排气工质（氢）注入器。其余运行中区段会自动补偿注入量。
Turns off the Exhaust Mass Injector for section 2 |(hydrogen). This is automatically compensated |by the other active sections.
关闭 2 区排气工质（氢）注入器。其余运行中区段会自动补偿注入量。
Turns off the Exhaust Mass Injector for section 3 |(hydrogen). This is automatically compensated |by the other active sections.
关闭 3 区排气工质（氢）注入器。其余运行中区段会自动补偿注入量。
Turns off the Exhaust Plasma Confinement Unit |for section 1. This is automatically compensated |by the other active sections.
关闭 1 区排气等离子体约束组件。其余运行中区段会自动补偿约束强度。
Turns off the Exhaust Plasma Confinement Unit |for section 2. This is automatically compensated |by the other active sections.
关闭 2 区排气等离子体约束组件。其余运行中区段会自动补偿约束强度。
Turns off the Exhaust Plasma Confinement Unit |for section 3. This is automatically compensated |by the other active sections.
关闭 3 区排气等离子体约束组件。其余运行中区段会自动补偿约束强度。
Turns off the Fusion Plasma Confinement Unit for|section 1. This is automatically compensated by|the other active sections.
关闭 1 区聚变等离子体约束组件。其余运行中区段会自动补偿约束强度。
Turns off the Fusion Plasma Confinement Unit for|section 2. This is automatically compensated by|the other active sections.
关闭 2 区聚变等离子体约束组件。其余运行中区段会自动补偿约束强度。
Turns off the Fusion Plasma Confinement Unit for|section 3. This is automatically compensated by|the other active sections.
关闭 3 区聚变等离子体约束组件。其余运行中区段会自动补偿约束强度。
Turns off the helium-3 / deuterium injector for|section 1. This is automatically compensated by|the other active sections.
关闭 1 区氦 3 / 氘注入器。其余运行中区段会自动补偿注入量。
Turns off the helium-3 / deuterium injector for|section 2. This is automatically compensated by|the other active sections.
关闭 2 区氦 3 / 氘注入器。其余运行中区段会自动补偿注入量。
Turns off the helium-3 / deuterium injector for|section 3. This is automatically compensated by|the other active sections.
关闭 3 区氦 3 / 氘注入器。其余运行中区段会自动补偿注入量。
Turns off the oxygen supply (not required with the|APUs off)
关断氧气供应（APU 关闭后不再需要氧气）。

Turns on the Crew Module's Thermal Control|Unit A. The CMTCUs manage three heat pipes in|the crew module:|- equipment cooling to 288 K|- refrigeration systems to 244 K|- cryogenic systems to 22 K (used primarily to|cool the EM shield's superconducting coils).|For normal operations use either unit A or unit B,|for a faster settling time both can be operating in|parallel.
开启乘员舱热控组件（CMTCU）A。CMTCU 管理乘员舱三套热管的温度：|- 设备冷却：288 K。|- 制冷系统：244 K。|- 低温系统：22 K（主要用于冷却电磁盾的超导线圈）。|正常运行时仅需使用 A 或 B 组件之一，如需更快达到目标温度也可同时运行二者。

Turns on the Crew Module's Thermal Control|Unit B. The CMTCUs manage three heat pipes in|the crew module:|- equipment cooling to 288 K|- refrigeration systems to 244 K|- cryogenic systems to 22 K (used primarily to|cool the EM shield's superconducting coils).|For normal operations use either unit A or unit B,|for a faster settling time both can be operating in|parallel.
开启乘员舱热控组件（CMTCU）B。CMTCU 管理乘员舱三套热管的温度：|- 设备冷却：288 K。|- 制冷系统：244 K。|- 低温系统：22 K（主要用于冷却电磁盾的超导线圈）。|正常运行时仅需使用 A 或 B 组件之一，如需更快达到目标温度也可同时运行二者。
Turns on the Energy Storage and Conditionning|Unit, section 1. It supplies the 20 kV and 400 V|lines from the energy stored in its "SMES"|superconducting coils.
开启 1 区储能与调节组件。它使用其『SMES』超导线圈的储能，为 20 kV 和 400 V 线路供电。
Turns on the Energy Storage and Conditionning|Unit, section 2. It supplies the 20 kV and 400 V|lines from the energy stored in its "SMES"|superconducting coils.
开启 2 区储能与调节组件。它使用其『SMES』超导线圈的储能，为 20 kV 和 400 V 线路供电。
Turns on the Energy Storage and Conditionning|Unit, section 3. It supplies the 20 kV and 400 V|lines from the energy stored in its "SMES"|superconducting coils.
开启 3 区储能与调节组件。它使用其『SMES』超导线圈的储能，为 20 kV 和 400 V 线路供电。
Turns on the Exhaust Mass Injector for section 1 |(hydrogen).
开启 1 区排气工质（氢）注入器。
Turns on the Exhaust Mass Injector for section 2 |(hydrogen).
开启 2 区排气工质（氢）注入器。
Turns on the Exhaust Mass Injector for section 3 |(hydrogen).
开启 3 区排气工质（氢）注入器。
Turns on the Exhaust Plasma Confinement Unit |for section 1.
开启 1 区排气等离子体约束组件。
Turns on the Exhaust Plasma Confinement Unit |for section 2.
开启 2 区排气等离子体约束组件。
Turns on the Exhaust Plasma Confinement Unit |for section 3.
开启 3 区排气等离子体约束组件。
Turns on the Fusion Plasma Confinement Unit for|section 1.
开启 1 区聚变等离子体约束组件。
Turns on the Fusion Plasma Confinement Unit for|section 2.
开启 2 区聚变等离子体约束组件。
Turns on the Fusion Plasma Confinement Unit for|section 3.
开启 3 区聚变等离子体约束组件。

Turns on the LH2 cryo-pump #1. The liquid|hydrogen boils in the vaporizer to supply gaseous|hydrogen to the H2 manifold. The change of state|and temperature elevation contributes to cooling|the section's equipment.
启动液氢低温泵 #1。液氢经蒸发器气化后供应氢气总管，气化过程的相变和升温会辅助冷却本区段设备。

Turns on the LH2 cryo-pump #2. The liquid|hydrogen boils in the vaporizer to supply gaseous|hydrogen to the H2 manifold. The change of state|and temperature elevation contributes to cooling|the section's equipment.
启动液氢低温泵 #2。液氢经蒸发器气化后供应氢气总管，气化过程的相变和升温会辅助冷却本区段设备。

Turns on the LH2 cryo-pump #3. The liquid|hydrogen boils in the vaporizer to supply gaseous|hydrogen to the H2 manifold. The change of state|and temperature elevation contributes to cooling|the section's equipment.
启动液氢低温泵 #3。液氢经蒸发器气化后供应氢气总管，气化过程的相变和升温会辅助冷却本区段设备。

Turns on the LO2 cryo-pump #1. The liquid|oxygen boils in the vaporizer to supply gaseous|oxygen to the O2 manifold. The change of state|and temperature elevation contributes to cooling|the section's equipment.
启动液氧低温泵 #1。液氧经蒸发器气化后供应氧气总管，气化过程的相变和升温会辅助冷却本区段设备。

Turns on the LO2 cryo-pump #2. The liquid|oxygen boils in the vaporizer to supply gaseous|oxygen to the O2 manifold. The change of state|and temperature elevation contributes to cooling|the section's equipment.
启动液氧低温泵 #2。液氧经蒸发器气化后供应氧气总管，气化过程的相变和升温会辅助冷却本区段设备。

Turns on the LO2 cryo-pump #3. The liquid|oxygen boils in the vaporizer to supply gaseous|oxygen to the O2 manifold. The change of state|and temperature elevation contributes to cooling|the section's equipment.
启动液氧低温泵 #3。液氧经蒸发器气化后供应氧气总管，气化过程的相变和升温会辅助冷却本区段设备。
Turns on the Thermal Control and Cryogenic Unit,|section 1. It regulates the equipment bay T° and|the 24 K cryogenic circuit (superconducting|devices and cryo tanks).
打开 1 区热控与低温组件。它调节设备舱和 24 K 低温回路（超导设备和低温储箱）的温度。
Turns on the Thermal Control and Cryogenic Unit,|section 2. It regulates the equipment bay T° and|the 24 K cryogenic circuit (superconducting|devices and cryo tanks).
打开 2 区热控与低温组件。它调节设备舱和 24 K 低温回路（超导设备和低温储箱）的温度。
Turns on the Thermal Control and Cryogenic Unit,|section 3. It regulates the equipment bay T° and|the 24 K cryogenic circuit (superconducting|devices and cryo tanks).
打开 3 区热控与低温组件。它调节设备舱和 24 K 低温回路（超导设备和低温储箱）的温度。
Turns on the helium-3 / deuterium injector for|section 1.
开启 1 区氦 3 / 氘注入器。
Turns on the helium-3 / deuterium injector for|section 2.
开启 2 区氦 3 / 氘注入器。
Turns on the helium-3 / deuterium injector for|section 3.
开启 3 区氦 3 / 氘注入器。
Turns on the temperature regulation for the |Pressurant, LH2, LO2, He-3 and D2 tanks.|([●] shortcut at the top left)
开启增压气体、液氢、液氧、氦 3 和氘气储箱的温控（左上角【●】快捷按钮）。

Two avoid switching back and forth between the|comms unit and the map, chain select the|satellites in one sweep then recall them using|the selection history (mouse wheel on the |slot's target selection button)
为避免在地图和通信组件之间来回切换，你可在地图一次性选择一批卫星，然后在通信面板使用选取历史记录功能（在槽位的目标选择按钮上滚动鼠标滚轮）。
Under thrust, increasing the fusion power|reduces the hydrogen flow into the EMA |chamber. See EMA feed priority below.
推进过程中，增加聚变功率会降低流入 EMA 室的氢流量。见下文 EMA 供应优先级。
Unless under specific circumstances, plan a|circularization maneuver to a parking orbit clear|of all stations' restricted orbspaces.
如无特殊情况，规划一个圆化停泊轨道的机动，以与空间站限制空域保持净空。
Unlocks the controls for the hatches and pressure|equalization valves.
解锁各舱口和均压活门的控制面板。
Upload the plan to the flight controller or |continue planning.
上传计划到飞行控制器，或继续规划。
Upload the plan to the flight controller.
上传计划到飞行控制器。
Uploads the current plan into the flight controller.|The trajectory data will serve as reference for the |auto-pilot (flight guidance system).|The button is visible when the plan is modified
将当前计划上传到飞行控制器。轨迹数据将作为自动驾驶（飞行制导系统）的基准。该按钮在计划有更改时显示。
Use the CSN-F9 systems' multiple redundancy|to compensate for the loss of a device. Typically|this involves using the various cross-valves and|switches.
使用 CSN-F9 的多重冗余来补偿损失的设备。一般会用到各个交输活门和连接器。
Use the slider to sweep the map time, back to |center for fixed time. |In this context click the departure time selector |to set its value to the current map time.
使用滑块扫掠地图时间，滑块置于中间可定格时间。完成后，单击【📏🕜】，即可用当前地图时间设定离港时间。
Use the time control slider to sweep time forward |and backward.
使用时间控制滑块向前和向后扫掠时间。
Uses hydrogen from the H2 manifold to|pressurize the pressurant manifold. This saves the|passive pressurization system for emergencies.
让氢气总管为增压气体总管供氢，保留被动增压系统以备应急使用。
Using an orbit object as a plan departure (initial|conditions for the trajectory)
使用轨道对象作为计划起点（轨迹的初始状态）。
Using an orbit object as planning target.
使用轨道作为规划目标。
Validate the selected station as the approach|destination. Click the button or use the mouse|wheel to bring up the selection history.
将所选空间站确认为进近目的地。单击按钮或使用鼠标滚轮可调出选择历史。

Virtual "Parking Orbits" have two main uses:|- As target / destination for the automatic flight|planner and editor interception computation.|- To define the departure conditions for flight|plans not initiated from the ship's current state.
虚拟的『停泊轨道』有两个主要用途：|- 作为自动飞行规划器和编辑器的目标 / 目的地。|- 为不从飞船当前状态起始的飞行计划定义初始条件。
W P S U A: activate
W P S U A：激活
W P S U B: activate
W P S U B：激活
Wait for OTC to issue the Reactor Activation |clearance. This should happen about 80 km|away from the station.
等待 OTC 下发反应堆启动许可。许可应在距空间站约 80 km 时下发。
Wait for docking clearance from Traffic Control
等待交通管制下发对接许可。
Wait for the "ATT/THR" advisory call to setup the|attitude and thrust control modes before |proceeding further.
下一步操作前，等待『ATT/THR』（姿态/推力）咨询提示。提示出现时设置姿态与推力控制模式。
Wait for the "Final Checks" advisory call |before proceeding further.
下一步操作前，等待『Final Checks』（最终检查）咨询提示。
Wait for the "Navigation Accuracy" advisory call |before proceeding further.
下一步操作前，等待『Navigation Accuracy』（导航精度）咨询提示。
Wait for the D2 and He-3 tanks to empty.|(you can use time acceleration)
等待氘气与氦 3 储箱排空（你可使用时间加速）。
Wait for the D2 tanks to refill.|(you can use time acceleration)
等待氘气储箱加注（你可使用时间加速）。
Wait for the He-3 tanks to fill.|(You can use time acceleration)
等待氦 3 储箱加注（你可使用时间加速）。
Wait for the LH2 tanks to empty.|(You can use time acceleration)
等待液氢储箱排空（你可使用时间加速）。
Wait for the LH2 tanks to fill.|(You can use time acceleration)
等待液氢储箱加注（你可使用时间加速）。
Wait for the LO2 tanks to empty.|(You can use time acceleration)
等待液氧储箱排空（你可使用时间加速）。
Wait for the LO2 tanks to fill.|(You can use time accleration)
等待液氧储箱加注（你可使用时间加速）。
Wait for the OTC clearance to undock
等待 OTC 的对接脱离许可。
Wait for the PCUs and ARUs control processes to|stabilize to their steady state. This might take a |while, increase the airflow if necessary.
等待 PCU 和 ARU 调节大气至稳定状态。这可能需要一些时间，你可按需增大气流量。
Wait for the SMES superconducting coils to get|to their operating temperature < 45 K. |The charging process will start automatically |(Auto mode). You can use time acceleration
等待 SMES 的超导线圈达到工作温度 < 45 K 后，充电会自动开始（Auto 模式）。你可使用时间加速。
Wait for the SMES to charge.|(You can use time acceleration)
等待 SMES 充电（你可使用时间加速）。

Wait for the SMES to discharge (you can use time|acceleration). A corresponding notification will be|issued and a request will be automatically sent to|the docking port to turn the 20 kV supply on|again.
等待 SMES 放电（你可使用时间加速）。放电完成时系统会发出通知，并自动请求重新开启 20 kV 供电。
Wait for the advisory call 20 km away from the|target
等待距目标 20 km 的咨询提示。
Wait for the crew module atmosphere to settle.
Wait for the departure burn to complete (you can|use the time acceleration).
等待离港点火完成（你可以使用时间加速）。
Wait for the gates to pressurize
Wait for the maneuver to complete
Wait for the plasma heating masers to turn off. |That automatically occurs when: |fusion power == Fusion Igniters total power|From then on the reaction will be running on|self-generated power.
等待等离子体脉泽加热器关闭。|聚变功率 == 聚变点火器总功率时，点火脉泽器自动关闭。自此聚变反应完全依靠自身功率维持。
Wait for the plasma igniters to shut-down
Wait for the pressurant tanks to fill.|(You can use time acceleration).
等待增压气体储箱加注（你可使用时间加速）。
Wait for the pressures to equalize
Wait for the pressurization circuits and tanks to|empty. You can use the time acceleration.
等待增压气体回路和储箱排空。你可使用时间加速。
Wait for the procedure to complete. This may take|some time depending on the BoM and facility|maintenance output (you may use time |acceleration).
等待维护完成。所需时间取决于 BoM 和设施的维修产出（你可使用时间加速）。
Wait for the smess to discharge
Wait for the tanks to fill.|You can use time acceleration or start running the|departure preparations (listed above)
等待储箱注满。你可以使用时间加速，或开始执行离港准备（检查单见下）。
Wait for the transition to complete
Wait for the transition to complete. The controller|will automatically engage the pending mode|upon reaching the destination.
等待中转完成。到达目的地后，控制器将自动接通待命的模式。
Wait for water tank A to empty
等待水箱 A 排空
Wait for water tank A to fill
等待水箱 A 注满
Wait for water tank B to empty
等待水箱 B 排空
Wait for water tank B to fill
等待水箱 B 注满
Waiting for all tanks to fill
Waiting for end of course correction if relevant
若必要，等待航线修正完成。
Waiting for the cryogenic circuits to cool
Wake-up the ship's systems from a full |shut-down, or refuel after a previous flight.
从完全关闭状态唤醒飞船各系统，或在前一次飞行后加油。

Water recycling settings:|- APU: pure water from the power plant's APUs|(fuel cells). More commonly used for emergency|refills.|- ARU: water extracted from the crew module's |atmosphere (primarily crew breathing and |perspiration)|- WMU: treated and purified waste water |(primatily hygiene water and urine)
水再生设置：|- APU：动力装置的 APU（燃料电池）提供的纯净水。一般用于应急补水。|- ARU：从乘员舱大气中提取的水（主要来自乘员呼吸和排汗）。|- WMU：经处理净化后的废水（主要来自卫生用水和尿液）。

Whatever the navigation signal source (with the|exception of dead reckoning), the associated |position error εP always remains reasonably|constant. That is in first approximation the|velocity error (1st derivative) can be considered|to be 0. In effect εV is thus a better indicator of|the accuracy of a course correction, especially|under XPR navigation with εP being possibly quite|large.
无论何种导航信号源（除航位推算外），其位置误差 εP 均大致保持恒定，这意味着速度误差（一阶导）可近似视为 0。因此速度误差 εV 很适合作为航线修正的精度指标，尤其是在使用 XPR 导航，从而 εP 可能相当大的情况下。
When ETB reaches zero, start the braking burn.
ETB 归零时，开始制动点火。
When activated sweeping the time will |correspondingly move the cursor along the |planned trajectory. The nearby [🔎] keeps the|view centered if activated.
激活时，扫掠时间会相应地令光标沿着预定轨迹移动。相邻的【🔎】激活时会保持视图居中于光标。

When approaching a ring station always check|that the procedure results in a glide path that |only collide with the ring close to the station.|Place the cursor at the end of the glide path|and it should be superimposed with the target.
进近星环空间站时，一定要检查滑行路径是否仅与空间站附近的星环相撞。将光标置于滑行路径末端，其应与目标重叠。

When departing from a ring station always check|that the departure procedure results in a circular|orbit without any collision ("end condition = |stable orbit"), typically contained within a rings|division. If that's not the case repeat the |procedure with more departure ∆V.
从星环空间站离港时，一定要检查离港程序是否结束于没有任何碰撞的圆形轨道（『End condition』=『Stable orbit』），该轨道通常会穿越环缝。若非如此，增加离港 ∆V 并重复以上过程。
When docked at the departure station the [▽+] |button will generate the departure orbit object|directly.
如果对接于离港空间站，【▽+】按钮可直接生成离港轨道对象。
When docked to a station, connecting to its|electrical grid also establishes a thermal bridge.
对接于空间站时，接入空间站电网的同时会一并建立一座热桥。

When facing problems the algorithm will try to|re-route a number of times along different paths.|However this may not be sufficient but given the |inherently chaotic nature of the problem |("alignemnents of planets") some solutions may |be found by tweaking the input parameters. |Typically: |- always try to tune the time multiplier: even |small adjustments may produce different results|- try to increase the "Large jump ∆V" for flights |with multiple jumps
遇到问题时，算法将尝试沿不同路径多次重新寻路。然而，考虑到问题（『行星的排列』）固有的混沌性，这有时无济于事。调整输入参数有可能找到一些解。|通常而言：|- 始终尝试调整时间乘数：即使很小的变动也可能产生完全不同的结果|- 对于多次跳跃的飞行，尝试增加|『Large jump ∆V』。
When in the galaxy map, use the [💫] button |or double-click a system to descend into its local |map. The [▽] button moves to ship's current |location.
若处于银河地图，使用【💫】按钮或双击某一星系进入星系本地地图。【▽】按钮可移动视图到飞船当前位置。
When increasing the fusion power under thrust,|set the EMA feed priority to the High setting.
若试图在推进过程中提升聚变功率，将 EMA 供应优先级设为 High（高）。
When open the inner equalization valves connect|the crew module's main habitat and the airlocks.|To be able to open the corresponding hatch, the |pressure differential must be less than 200 Pa.
内均压活门开启时，乘员舱的主居住区与气闸舱相连通。两舱的气压差小于 200 Pa 时舱口才能打开。
When open the outer equalization valves connect|the airlocks to the station's gates. To be able to|open the outer hatch, the pressure differential|must be less than 200 Pa.
外均压活门开启时，气闸舱与空间站廊桥相联通。二者的气压差小于 200 Pa 时外舱口才能打开。
When plugged into an external power grid it is |normal to connect all the sections and recharge |all SMESs simultaneously. |NB: the notification is muted by the "Docked |Inhibit" CSM switch.
接入外部电网时，可正常将所有区段的电路相连，从而对所有 SMES 同时充电。|注意：通知会被『对接抑制』电门静音。
When the burn parameters are set, engage the|attitude control as computed.
调定点火参数后，接通姿态控制解算。
When the device is successfully reconnected to|the supply bus, its state may have to be manually|restored to the intended configuration (ex: valve| ON/OFF)
设备成功重新连接到供电汇流条后，可能必须手动恢复其配置（例如：活门开启 / 关断）。
When the jump is successful the INUs and |navigation sensors lose the navigation signal.
成功跳跃后，INU 和导航传感器会丢失导航信号。
When the jump is successful the INUs need to |reconfigure and the navigation signal is lost for a|few seconds.
成功跳跃后，INU 需要重新配置，导航信号会丢失数秒。
When the reactor power is set, start the CCI|maneuver.
反应堆功率调定后，启动 CCI 机动。
With the cursor on the trajectory, click it or the|cursor menu button [☰] on the editor panel
将光标置于轨迹上，然后单击编辑器面板上的光标菜单按钮【☰】。
With the outer valves open the module's pressure|will equal that of the station's.
外均压活门开启后，乘员舱的气压会与空间站相同。
With the valves open the air pressure will settle|at the same value across the whole module.
均压活门开启后，整个乘员舱的气压会稳定在同一水平。
